String.Source: No, not in the kingdoms where I grew up.
String.Dest: 不，不是在我成长的王国。

String.Source: No, everything is perfect.
Alik'r Warrior
faction for party guests
Orc
What's with the Orc?
Haelga
A pendant. One that sparkles with the light of your eyes.
String.Dest: 一个挂坠.。一个能使你双眼发光的挂坠。

String.Source: Fort Greymoor
I need to trade some things with you.
Would you mind cooking something for me?
String.Dest: 你介意帮我煮点吃的吗？

String.Source: Sky Haven Temple
I'd like that.
High Gate Ruins Catacombs
Harmugstahl
You don't sound all that enthusiastic about inheriting the forge.
String.Dest: 你听起来不那么热衷继承锻造。

String.Source: The Ratway
I'm glad you could make it to the party.
String.Dest: 我很高兴你能让它来参加聚会。

String.Source: It's all I know. I can't imagine myself as a farmer.
String.Dest: 我只知道这些。不敢想象我成为一个农民。

String.Source: Fisherman
What's your problem?
No, to be honest, I live a rather boring life.
String.Dest: 不，实话说，我更宁愿过一个无聊平淡的生活。

String.Source: Cowflop Farmhouse
Khajiit
Steamscorch Mine
Pit Wolf
Conjure Dragon Priest
How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过？

String.Source: Barkeep
What's the word around town?
So I have this friend...She's trapped in a miserable marriage and wants out.
String.Dest: 我有这样一位朋友……她陷入了悲惨的婚姻并且想逃离出去。

String.Source: Gleda of Rorikstead. She's a goat.
String.Dest: 洛克利镇的格雷迪亚。她是一只山羊。

String.Source: Movarth's Lair
Scholar
You laugh, but Lod deserves better than a malnourished hag like you.
String.Dest: 你就笑吧你，但是你这发育不健全的巫婆绝对配不上罗德。

String.Source: Cyrodiil, like yourself, my love.
String.Dest: 赛伦迪尔, 亲爱的，要热爱自己。

String.Source: Wolfskull Ruins
Fort Sungard Shrine
Fort Sungard Annex
The Warrens
Hunter's Journal
What did you have in mind?
You're welcome.
I'd like your opinion on the Civil War.
String.Dest: 关于内战，我同意你的观点。

String.Source: Solitude
This land, Skyrim, is where I call home. Especially now that I have you.
String.Dest: 这一片土地，天际，是我称之为家的地方。特别是当我现在拥有了你。

String.Source: Evoker
Isobel. You'll never guess what happened out there.
String.Dest: 伊莎贝尔，你肯定无法想象外面究竟发生了什么。

String.Source: Windpeak Inn
Reveler
Goat Hide
Lexicon Receptacle
Isobel. I'm glad you came.
String.Dest: 伊莎贝尔。你能来真是太好了。

String.Source: Cellar
You sound pretty horrible at hide and seek.
String.Dest: 你的声音在暗处的时候听起来相当恐怖。

String.Source: Castle Dour
Fortify One-handed
Knifepoint Mine
Barbarian
Your old place would suit us just fine.
String.Dest: 你的老地方会很适合我们的。

String.Source: What happens if you don't inherit it?
String.Dest: 如果你不继承它会发生什么?

String.Source: Bodyguard
Investigate the Hall of the Dead
Torture Victim
Who were these other people?
String.Dest: 所谓的其他人指的是谁？

String.Source: I freed Kodlak's spirit. The Companions made me Harbinger.
String.Dest: 我给予克拉科的灵魂以自由，伙伴们让我成为了预言者。

String.Source: Sleeping Tree Cave
So what's the plan?
Student
Sergius
It was an easy mistake.
A sword no doubt. I will hold it in my hand, as if I was holding yours.
String.Dest: 毫无疑问是把剑，我会紧紧地握住它，就像握着你的剑一样。

String.Source: I prefer the quiet times. Coming to new towns, and meeting new people.
String.Dest: 我更喜欢和平的年代。可以前往新的城镇，可以见到新的人们。

String.Source: Bilegulch Mine
I know what you're talking about, but my village was stationary.
String.Dest: 我知道你想说什么，可是我的村庄是很久之前就在这里了。

String.Source: As a matter of fact, I'm from Kvatch. But I've always been the shy type.
String.Dest: 实际上，我来自科瓦奇城，但是我依然总是害羞。

String.Source: Miner's Barracks
Ghost
You'd like it in Hammerfell. Why not spend a year or two there?
String.Dest: 你喜欢落锤。为啥不在那儿呆个一两年呢？

String.Source: What would you say is your expertise?
How about my house in Windhelm?
String.Dest: 我在风盔城的房子怎么样？

String.Source: Rimerock Burrow
Here. Have a gold piece. (1 gold)
What's our next move?
Fenn's Gulch Mine
Redoran's Retreat
Windhelm Barracks
You're right. No hero goes it alone. What you do is admirable.
String.Dest: 你说的没错，没有英雄是独自一人的，你的做法让我很钦佩。

String.Source: Thanks, I guess.
I want to go back to my earlier questions.
String.Dest: 让我们回到先前的问题上。

String.Source: Has the store made any money?
Have you ever read "Immortal Blood?" Well I just killed Movarth Piquine.
String.Dest: 你读过"不朽之血"这本书吗?哦好吧，其实我就是那个杀掉莫瓦斯·皮其恩的人。

String.Source: The Drunken Huntsman
There was this blacksmith. We got married, and I kissed her.
String.Dest: 就这个铁匠。我们结婚了，我吻了她。

String.Source: How did you escape?
So what now?
Broken Tower Redoubt
As a matter of fact, yes.
Romlyn Dreth's House
Mara's Eye Den
Lost Echo Cave
Atheron Residence
Burguk's Longhouse
Beggar's Row
Oh, it's nothing. Forget I said anything.
Do you ever get bored here in Falkreath?
String.Dest: 在佛克瑞斯你从未感到过厌倦吗？

String.Source: Dragonsreach Jarl's Quarters
Shiv
I can tell you a story or two, perhaps over dinner.
String.Dest: 晚饭后我可以给你讲一两个小故事。

String.Source: Corpselight Farm
Blank Lexicon
By the Gods woman, it's obvious you are describing me as your ideal mate.
String.Dest: 众神在上啊，妹子，很明显你把我描述成你的理想伴侣了。

String.Source: The Pit
Dragonsreach Dungeon
Mistwatch West Tower
Liar's Retreat
A small village. The kind that sort of drift around with the river.
String.Dest: 一个小村庄，四面环水的那种。

String.Source: Nord
Vlindrel Hall
Boulderfall Cave
Who are you?
Honeyside, my house in Riften.
String.Dest: 甜蜜湾，我在裂谷城的房子。

String.Source: Adventurer
Here. Have a drink on me.
Shriekwind Bastion
Salvius Farmhouse
This isn't exactly a request, if you get my meaning.
Shadowgreen Cavern
Moss Mother Cavern
My house in Markarth would be perfect.
String.Dest: 我在马卡斯城的房子将会很完美。

String.Source: How did you train if you weren't his apprentice?
String.Dest: 如果你不是他的学徒，你是如何训练的？

String.Source: The Ragged Flagon
Yes, I have siblings. I grew up in a fairly normal home.
String.Dest: 是的，我有兄弟姐妹。我生长在一个普通的家庭。

String.Source: I need you to do something for me.
String.Dest: 我需要你为我做件事情。

String.Source: Good to see you.
I found a way to vanquish Alduin, but he escaped to Sovngarde.
String.Dest: 我找到了击败奥杜因的方法，但是他逃到了松加德。

String.Source: Solitude Guard
Bounty Hunter
Who were you talking to?
Let's live in my house in Solitude.
String.Dest: 让我们住在我在独孤城的房子里吧。

String.Source: Northwatch Prisoner
Nchuand-Zel Excavation Site
Fort Kastav Prison
Noble
What will you do?
Black Robes
Interested in me, are you?
Sorry, can't help you.
Good luck with that.
Pit Fan
Nchuand-Zel
Solitude Catacombs
Just passing through.
Are you alright?
Silver-Blood Inn
It's something only you can do. I need the blade quenched in a person's blood.
String.Dest: 有些事儿非你不成。我想用某人的血为这把刀淬火。

String.Source: They say he committed atrocities long before he found The Way of the Voice.
String.Dest: 据说参悟吼声之道不久后他就犯下累累暴行。

String.Source: Chest
It must be a battleaxe. Two hands, two souls. Bound together.
String.Dest: 这应该是把战斧，两只手，两个灵魂，紧紧地连接在一起。

String.Source: I agree. Crafting swords for nobles is like writing books for mudcrabs.
String.Dest: 我同意。为贵族造剑就跟写书给泥沼蟹看一样。

String.Source: They want to claim the throne via the Kingsmoot. No blood will be shed.
String.Dest: 他们想通过领主大会吓吓领主。不会流血。

String.Source: Isobel
You come from a family of blacksmiths?
String.Dest: 你出身于一个铁匠家庭？

String.Source: Steel Dagger
Healing Hands
Radiant Raiment
Wizard
Stormcloak Guard
Lever
Skyrim is my home.
Haelga's Bunkhouse
Swindler's Den
I met the Greybeards. They want me to retrieve the Horn of Jurgen Windcaller.
String.Dest: 我见过灰胡子了。他们想让我取回唤风者的号角。

String.Source: Kodlak Whitemane is dead.
High Rock. The province to the west of here.
String.Dest: 高岩省。与天际省西部毗邻的行省。

String.Source: Assassin
My love, I was wondering if you could lend your skills to forge an axe.
String.Dest: 亲爱的，我想知道能否借用你的技能打造一把斧头。

String.Source: Temple of Dibella
Sarethi Farm
Let's go.
Drelas
Steam Breath
Temple of Talos
Treva's Watch
What do you have for sale?
What is this place?
Sleeping Giant Inn
Elgrim's Elixirs
I hail from Black Marsh.
Falkreath Jail
Argonian Assemblage
Synod Researcher
I slew a dragon and took its soul. They say I'm the Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 因为我杀死了一头龙并且吸收了他的灵魂，所以他们说我是龙裔。

String.Source: Fellglow Keep Dungeons
Hall of the Dead
<Alias=Follower> is waiting for you
Alftand Ruined Tower
Like it or not, you should respect the tradition of your ancestors.
String.Dest: 不管你乐意与否，你得尊重你祖先所留下来的传统。

String.Source: Go on.
No, I haven't.
Northwatch Keep
Thalmor
What happens now?
The Empire is flaccid and kneels to the Thalmor. We need a strong ruler.
String.Dest: 帝国是软弱得居然被梭默打败。我们需要一个强大的统治者。

String.Source: Hat
Isobel, I was wondering if you could lend your skills to forge an axe.
String.Dest: 伊莎贝尔，我非常想知道如果你用你的技能来锻造一把斧子是怎样。

String.Source: Corpse
What's on your mind?
Why not?
Chillfurrow Farm
Wait here a moment.
Viola Giordano's House
String.Dest: 维奥拉·乔尔丹诺的房屋

String.Source: I don't know. I've been away from home for so long.
String.Dest: 我不知道。我已经离开家太久了。

String.Source: Purewater Run
Drelas' Cottage
East Empire Company
Dead Man's Drink
Fort Greymoor Prison
Lund's Hut
Centurion Dynamo Core
Good news. I got the bloodgrass.
You look a little young to be a blacksmith.
String.Dest: 对于铁匠这个职业，你看起來有点年轻。

String.Source: What did you see?
It seems Morrowind is always rebuilding.
String.Dest: 似乎晨风总是在重建中。

String.Source: Elsweyr. As in the province.
Honorhall Orphanage
Lost Knife Hideout
Karthwasten Hall
Dead Crone Rock
Thane Larsdon doesn't want war. Just a chance to present another option.
String.Dest: 劳斯登男爵不希望战争。这只是一个呈现出另一种选择的机会。

String.Source: What are you doing out here?
How did he die?
Snapleg Cave
Slave
How so?
Cidhna Mine
I actually travel with companions. So I don't get too lonely.
String.Dest: 事实上我和伙伴同行。因此并不太孤独。

String.Source: Times change, and the old ways die. You should live your own life.
String.Dest: 世风日下，人心不古。你该过你自己的生活。

String.Source: Breezehome, my house in Whiterun.
String.Dest: 风宅，我在雪漫城的房子。

String.Source: Well met.
What did he do?
Isobel, my love. Something's troubling me and I need your advice.
String.Dest: 亲爱的伊莎贝尔，有些事难住我了，我需要你的建议。

String.Source: Can I make a request?
Tell me about yourself.
Skeever Tail
What is it you do here?
Cracked Tusk Vaults
Candlehearth Hall
I found that book you wanted.
What makes you say that?
You're a necromancer?
I'd like to make a request.
The Hero of Kvatch is half the hero I am.
String.Dest: 我是 科瓦奇城的英雄，估计只算半个英雄吧。

String.Source: Hall of Attainment
Cragwallow Slope
You look like you want to tell me something.
String.Dest: 你的表情告诉我你有话要说。

String.Source: Snow-Shod Manor
Breton
Now that we're married, we ought to get to know each other better.
String.Dest: 既然已经结为夫妻，我们应该互相了解多一点吧。

String.Source: There are people who want the Emperor dead. They want me to kill him.
String.Dest: 有人想要皇帝的命，他们要我去行刺他。

String.Source: Lemkil's Farmhouse
Brazier
Follow me. I need your help.
String.Dest: 跟着我。我需要你的帮助。

String.Source: There's no need to fret. I want to spend the rest of my life with you. Marry me.
String.Dest: 不要犹豫了，我想与你共度余生。跟我结婚吧。

String.Source: You're on. (Brawl - 100 gold)
Serpent's Bluff Ruins
Blue Palace
Rorik's Manor
Proudspire Manor
I don't know, forge it out of some combination of orichalcum and stahlrim.
String.Dest: 我不知道，这玩意是由星陨石与魔冰混合锻造出来的。

String.Source: Black-Briar Meadery
Hagraven Claw
Fire Storm
Lakeview Manor.
Black Mage Hood
Living with you would be perfect.
String.Dest: 和你一起生活将会很完美。

String.Source: Honeyside
Wood Elf
The Ratway Warrens
Fort Sungard Muster
Greywater Grotto
Conjure Dremora Lord
Erith
Lost Prospect Mine
What about you?
Broken Fang Cave
Why are you here?
Argonian
Dragonborn
I actually grew up in the Dragontail Mountains. Lots of Orcs, lots of old magic.
String.Dest: 其实我在龙尾山脉长大。哪里有很多兽族，很多古老的魔法。

String.Source: The Ragged Flagon - Cistern
String.Dest: 破碎的大酒壶 · 蓄水池

String.Source: It's actually quite tedious. Sort of like this conversation.
String.Dest: 事实上这相当乏味。很少有人喜欢这种转变。

String.Source: What do the Thalmor want with you?
String.Dest: 梭默那群人想从你身上得到什么？

String.Source: Isobel, fine job on forging that axe.
String.Dest: 伊莎贝尔，这斧子铸得好哇。

String.Source: Fort Hraggstad
It was a young love. Meant nothing.
String.Dest: 这除了幼稚的爱情以外什么都不是。

String.Source: Skeleton
Isobel. Fancy meeting you here.
String.Dest: 伊莎贝尔……怎么会在这里遇见你？

String.Source: Mercenary
I'm just exploring.
Hagraven Feathers
Mistveil Keep
Lund
Hall of the Vigilant
Wisp
I know what everyone did, but I wasn't there. My mind was in another place.
String.Dest: 我知道别人都怎么想，但是我当时并不算是在那里。我当时在琢磨其他的事。

String.Source: Cracked Tusk Keep
Sven
You won't believe this, but this all seems like a dream.
String.Dest: 你不会相信这些的，所有这些就像一个梦。

String.Source: Didn't the Aldmeri Dominion conquer Kvatch in the Great War?
String.Dest: 难道在世界大战中先祖神洲没能攻克科瓦奇城吗？

String.Source: Bloodlet Throne
Windhelm
Markarth
Moorside Inn
Excuse me?
Riftweald Manor
Skeever
What do you do for a living?
Tell me about Riften.
String.Dest: 告诉我关于裂谷城的事。

String.Source: Apparently the Blades aren't extinct. The innkeeper in Riverwood was one.
String.Dest: 表面上刀锋会并不存在，但是溪木镇的旅馆就是一个据点。

String.Source: Smuggler
The Bannered Mare
I would be honored to have you by my side. Even if it's just as a shield.
String.Dest: 有你陪伴是我的荣幸，尽管你只是来当肉盾的。

String.Source: Penitus Oculatus Outpost
I want us to be honest with each other. There's some things you should know.
String.Dest: 我希望我们能够对彼此坦诚。这裡有些事情是你需要知道的。

String.Source: Fellglow Keep
I'm a member of the Dark Brotherhood.
String.Dest: 我是黑暗兄弟会的其中一员。

String.Source: Heljarchen Hall.
I'm the Dragonborn.
Proudspire Manor, my house in Solitude.
String.Dest: 傲矛别墅，我在独孤城的家。

String.Source: It's the Blades. They want me to kill Paarthurnax.
String.Dest: 是刀锋战士，是他们想让我杀了帕图纳克斯的。

String.Source: Hjerim, my house in Windhelm.
String.Dest: 海里姆，我在风盔城的房子。

String.Source: What else did Beirand do for you?
String.Dest: 博兰德都为你做了什么?

String.Source: As a matter of fact, I was at Helgen when the dragon attacked.
String.Dest: 事实上，当巨龙来袭时我正好在海尔根。

String.Source: Child
And wherever you stand, I shall call home as well.
String.Dest: 这天下的地盘都是我的，不管你走到哪里，所处的位置都是在我的家里。

String.Source: Worker's House
Master-Wizard
Sometimes I get exhausted from adventuring. It's so repetitive.
String.Dest: 冒险总是让我精疲力竭，因为它真的很单调。

String.Source: Perhaps another time.
Soljund's Sinkhole
What did you do?
Whiterun
Black-Briar Manor
Falion's House
Revenge. And the only thing that's troubling me as how best to make him suffer.
String.Dest: 复仇。并且唯一令我困扰的是怎么才能使他最痛苦。

String.Source: Drain Health
Never mind.
Belted Tunic
Angarvunde Catacombs
Orotheim
Yes. Let me show you.
How's business?
What can I do to help?
Ahlam
Mauhulakh's Longhouse
With some armors, the arrows get stuck inside you. Harder to heal.
String.Dest: 你现在穿着盔甲，箭已经射进你的身体里了。这个很难治疗。

String.Source: Wait here.
What is it you want?
If I get these items for you, will you make this oil?
String.Dest: 如果我帮你找到这些东西，你会做出这种油么？

String.Source: Hagraven
I come from Morrowind.
The Companions have accepted me into their ranks.
String.Dest: 战友团已经接受我到他们的队伍之中。

String.Source: Generic dialogue
I snore like a mammoth.
String.Dest: 我打呼鲁时活像一只长毛象。

String.Source: Folgunthur
I noticed your family didn't make it to the wedding.
String.Dest: 我注意到你的家人没有让它来参加婚礼。

String.Source: The White Phial
Apprentice
The Treasury House
Unfortunately, my family and I are estranged.
String.Dest: 不幸的是，我和我的家庭分开了。

String.Source: What are your thoughts on how the ritual with Larsdon went?
String.Dest: 你觉得有劳斯登在，仪式进行得如何？

String.Source: I have a house in Riften.
I prefer to have a man's steel, if you know what I mean.
String.Dest: 我更喜欢男式武器，如果你知道我指的是什么。

String.Source: Well met. Rare I meet a smith with such soft hands, and such radiant beauty.
String.Dest: 你好。我很少遇上像你这样拥有如此柔软的双手以及如此美丽耀眼的铁匠。

String.Source: Brunwulf Free-Winter's House
We could live in my house in Whiterun.
String.Dest: 我们可以住在我在雪漫城的房子里。

String.Source: Maybe another time.
It's difficult. Dangerous. And I couldn't live without it.
String.Dest: 很难。很危险。要没它我是活不成了。

String.Source: I'm an extremely picky eater.
Absorb <mag> points of health per second from the target.
String.Dest: 从目标每秒持续吸取<mag>点生命。

String.Source: High Gate Ruins
No thanks.
Understone Keep
Riften
Where will you go now?
Boethiah's Shadow
Ogmund's House
This isn't just any axe. Most smiths would strangle a puppy for such a chance.
String.Dest: 这可不是把普通的斧子。大部分铁匠会为了这个机会干掉一个小嫩芽。

String.Source: It's not for me. It's for the future High Queen of Skyrim.
String.Dest: 这不是为了我，这是为了天际未来的至高女王。

String.Source: Hello.
That sounds almost romantic. Like a forge wife and her warrior spouse.
String.Dest: 听上去少了些浪漫。像是做铁匠的妻子和她的战士丈夫。

String.Source: The Midden
Belethor's General Goods
That's none of your concern.
Steepfall Burrow
Actually, it's not a new axe. I need you to reforge an old one.
String.Dest: 其实，这不是一个新的斧头。 我需要你重铸一个旧的。

String.Source: New Gnisis Cornerclub
I've never met Adrianne, so to be honest, I don't get what you mean.
String.Dest: 我从没见过阿德里安娜，所以说实话，我不明白你什么意思。

String.Source: I also left out one other detail. Forging the axe requires a blood sacrifice.
String.Dest: 我还漏掉了另一个细节。 锻造斧头需要鲜血的献祭。

String.Source: Bandit
I do whatever brings the most profit. That happens to be adventuring.
String.Dest: 我不择手段获取最大利益，那或许也是非常冒险的。

String.Source: Anonymous Letter
It does get lonely out there. Less so if I had you to come home to.
String.Dest: 它在那边好寂寞啊，所以最少我也要带你回家去。

String.Source: Eldergleam Sanctuary
Angarvunde
For <dur> seconds, opponents in melee range take <mag> points fire damage per second. Targets on fire take extra damage.
String.Dest: 近身的敌人每秒受到<mag>点火焰伤害，持续<dur>秒。着火目标将承受额外伤害。

String.Source: Well, good luck with that.
String.Dest: 嗯，那也只能祝你好运了。

String.Source: Maybe some other time.
Redguard
You live here?
RelationshipMarriagePostWeddingLoveInterestBlockingTopic
I think I've earned that 100 gold.
String.Dest: 我想你该付我那100金币了。

String.Source: Graywinter Watch
What about the other person? Anything on him?
String.Dest: 其他人呢？他们有任何关于他的消息吗？

String.Source: Lost Valkygg
Bards College
Nchuand-Zel Quarters
I'm sorry.
Solitude Lighthouse
Summons a Dremora Lord for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: 召唤卡斯塔格为你战斗<dur>秒。

String.Source: Blacksmiths are like flies. If one dies, there are plenty more milling about.
String.Dest: 铁匠就像锉刀。坏一个，其他的就需要更多的磨练。

String.Source: Geirmund's Hall
Dremora Lord
One-handed weapons do <mag>% more damage for <dur> seconds.
String.Dest: 单手武器在<dur>秒内增加<mag>%伤害。

String.Source: You mentioned you were from Kvatch.
String.Dest: 你说你是来自于科瓦奇城的。

String.Source: Business Ledger
Rogue Wizard
You forget how hot it is down there. You might sweat to death first.
String.Dest: 你忘了这下面有多烫，你会直接蒸发掉的。

String.Source: Beggar
Morndas
Temple of Kynareth
Reachwind Eyrie
The Thalmor are good people. Just misunderstood.
String.Dest: 梭默都是善良的人，只是误解。

String.Source: This forge is possessed by your ancestor?
String.Dest: 这个熔炉被你的先祖附体了?

String.Source: I want to hear about your travels across Skyrim.
String.Dest: 我想听你讲讲在天际旅行的事。

String.Source: How long have you lived in Windhelm?
String.Dest: 你在风盔城生活多久了？

String.Source: Vlindrel Hall, my house in Markarth.
String.Dest: 林德尔会堂，我在马卡斯城的房子。

String.Source: Ustengrav
Frostfruit Inn
I think you and Lod would make a great couple.
String.Dest: 我觉得你和罗德会是不错的一对儿。

String.Source: I don't associate with those tyrants.
Arm Bandages
Castle Dour Dungeon
How did you end up here?
Halldir's Cairn
HumanBeard22
A shield. So that you will keep me safe, as I do the world.
String.Dest: 一个盾牌。所以你会保证我的安全，就像我保卫这一切一样。

String.Source: Hawk Beak
Delphine
Bleak Falls Temple
I know you don't like crafting for nobles, but how about a Thane?
String.Dest: 我知道你不愿意为贵族干活儿，可要是为男爵，那么可以吗？

String.Source: Fort Sungard Tower
What happens if you craft this item?
String.Dest: 你做好这件东西会怎么样？

String.Source: Still no word. I'm beginning to worry about them.
String.Dest: 还是没有消息。我开始担心他们了。

String.Source: The Frozen Hearth
Thalmor Embassy, Elenwen's Solar
String.Dest: 梭默大使馆阿兰雯房间

String.Source: Unowned Cell
Temple of Mara
Cronvangr Cave
Sunderstone Gorge
Vilemyr Inn
I've joined the Thieves Guild.
String.Dest: 我已经加入了盗贼公会。

String.Source: Yeah, I was born and raised in the city. It would fit anywhere in Cyrodiil.
String.Dest: 是的，我在这城市里出生，长大。这个针对赛瑞迪尔的任何一处也适用。

String.Source: Brittleshin Pass
Noblewoman
Bard
Is something the matter?
I'm here to rescue you.
Valenwood is my home.
Coffin
Thalmor Headquarters
Anything else?
Nobleman
Nightgate Inn Cellar
Silent Moons Camp
DualFlurry
Hjerim
Embry
Pirate
I've done it, my love. Alduin is dead. The world is safe again.
String.Dest: 我成功了！亲爱的。奥杜因已死。整个世界又安全了。

String.Source: Quick Test Cell
I doubt you could forge anything worthwhile.
String.Dest: 我真怀疑你能造出什么有价值的东西。

String.Source: Arch-Mage
No my dear, I'm not from Kvatch.
String.Dest: 不，亲爱的，我不是来自科瓦奇城。

String.Source: Horker
Skyrim
Belyn Hlaalu's House
Jenassa
What brings you to this party?
Labyrinthian Thoroughfare
Guard
Windstad Manor.
The Mortar and Pestle
Bran
Sanuarach Mine
What do you mean?
Nightgate Inn
Alchemist
Nazeem
Okay.
Imperial
It's time, my love. I'm off to vanquish the World Eater. Wish me luck.
String.Dest: 是时候了亲爱的。我要去除掉奥杜因。祝我们好运吧。

String.Source: I'm an orphan. You're the only family I've got. And the only one I need.
String.Dest: 我是个孤儿。你是我唯一的家人。也是我唯一需要的人。

String.Source: Dibella Statue
The Arcanaeum
Gloomreach Hive
Luaffyn
Labyrinthian Chasm
The Winking Skeever
Temple of the Divines
I don't know her name. Brothel whores tend not to give them.
String.Dest: 我不知道她的名字。妓女们一般不会说名字的。

String.Source: Are you in charge here?
Steam breath
Falmer Servant
Falmer Shaman
Not yet, but I'm sure the courier will be arriving any day now.
String.Dest: 还没有，不过我确定那个信使这两天随时可能出现。

String.Source: Orphan's Tear
Are you enjoying the party?
You have no idea. I am <Alias=Player>. In time, my name will be legend.
String.Dest: 你不知道。我是 <Alias=Player>. 假以时日，我的名字会成为传奇。

String.Source: Well, that's a relief. Now I don't have to kill him.
String.Dest: 呼，解脱了。现在我不必非杀他不可了。

String.Source: Farmer
Silus Vesuius's House
Dwarven Centurion
Fort Sungard Oubliette
Fire/Frost/Shock Mage
I met a talking dragon named Paarthurnax.
String.Dest: 我遇见了一条会说话的龙，名字叫帕图纳克斯。

String.Source: Reflect Blows
What are you in for?
Bruca's Leap Redoubt
Whistling Mine
Are you the local blacksmith?
Uttering Hills Cave
So I have this friend...He's trapped in a miserable marriage and wants out.
String.Dest: 所以我有这样的一个朋友……他被困在悲惨的婚姻里想出来.

String.Source: Dwarven Spider
Leather Boots
I assume you explained this to the ones who came before me.
String.Dest: 我猜你已经把这事解释给我之前来的那个人听了吧。

String.Source: I don't have time for this.
That's all the questions I have.
Dragonsreach
Thonnir's House
Abandoned Prison
Nightshade
Gloves
Warehouse
Dark Brotherhood Assassin
You have no idea. I am <Alias=Player>. I am the Dragonborn. I...am a legend.
String.Dest: 我没有意见，我是 <Alias=Player>. 我就是龙裔。我...就是一个传奇。

String.Source: Four Shields Tavern
I'm just glad you're here, love. This world wouldn't be the same without you.
String.Dest: 真高兴你在这里，亲爱的。没有你的世界，什么都变了样。

String.Source: What's so special about the Star-Blood forge?
String.Dest: 这星血熔炉有什么特别之处？

String.Source: Larak's Longhouse
Abandoned House
Elrindir
Hall of Valor
Or we can go to Cyrodiil so I can meet your parents.
String.Dest: 要不然我们去赛瑞迪尔一起见你父母。

String.Source: No thank you. I craft my own weapons and armor.
String.Dest: 不了谢谢。我的武器盔甲都是自己打的。

String.Source: Saarthal
Is there anything I can do to help?
I have parents, but no brothers or sisters.
String.Dest: 我有父母，但没有兄弟姐妹。

String.Source: War Quarters
Who says you have to forge for nobles? You'll be in charge.
String.Dest: 谁说你非得为贵族做事不可？你可以自己做主！

String.Source: Okay. Tell me about yourself.
String.Dest: 好的，把你的事告诉我吧。

String.Source: You're a Stormcloak?
Fort Snowhawk
A bow. To pierce a heart as you have mine.
String.Dest: 一张爱之弓，在你我彼此相恋之时刺穿了我们的心。

String.Source: White River Watch
Broken Helm Hollow
Iron Arrow
Braidwood Inn
What happened?
What was that argument about?
My wife, I come from a land to the west known as the Summerset Isle.
String.Dest: 我的妻子和我是从西边那片被叫做夏暮省的土地来的。

String.Source: Follow me.
Is there any way I can help?
Bleakcoast Cave
Sadri's Used Wares
Lost Knife Cave
Not right now.
Bear
Yes, it's not like the actual Skyforge would stand out or anything.
String.Dest: 是啊，它确实不像天空熔炉那么超群或者别的什么的。

String.Source: Ustengrav Depths
My family aren't blood relatives, but people I trust.
String.Dest: 我的家族不是血缘关系的亲人，而是我信任的人。

String.Source: Lod's House
What if I were standing on a large pile of manure?
String.Dest: 那如果当时我是站在巨大的一堆肥料上呢？

String.Source: Kilkreath Catacombs
Why is that?
I wonder if I meet those qualifications.
String.Dest: 我不知道能否达那些要求啊。

String.Source: What's the problem?
The deserts of Hammerfell.
How did that story come about?
String.Dest: 那个故事是如何发生的呢？

String.Source: I've got better things to do.
String.Dest: 我有更重要的事情要做。

String.Source: Bloated Man's Grotto
The Bee and Barb
What happened to him?
Sounds like Larsdon. I was asking on his behalf.
String.Dest: 听起来像是劳斯登。我是他的代表。

String.Source: That's none of your business.
Snow-Shod Farm
Labyrinthian, Tribune
Dawnstar.
Let's just say you might find more hair around the house.
String.Dest: 这么说吧，你可能会在房子里找到更多的头发。

String.Source: It will be my honor.
The Chill
What sort of ritual do you have undergo?
String.Dest: 你在进行一个怎样的仪式？

String.Source: I don't have time for that.
Thalmor Justiciar
Leave It
<Alias=Animal> is waiting for you
Breezehome
What will you do now?
You stay at Lod's house. Are the two of you together?
String.Dest: 你留在了罗德的房子里，那另外两个人跟你在一起吗？

String.Source: I want to ask you some more personal questions.
String.Dest: 我要问你一些更加私人的问题。

String.Source: I'd like us to move somewhere else.
String.Dest: 我想我们得去别的什么地方。

String.Source: Kilkreath Temple
Embershard Mine
What was that all about?
Let's just hope they aren't doing something foolish like ignoring me.
String.Dest: 希望他们别做蠢事，比如无视我的存在什么的……

String.Source: Barrel
<Cool graphic>
You don't have the required item.
Yes Lod?
I present the two of you with these matching rings, blessed by Mara's divine grace. May they protect each of you in your new life together.
String.Dest: 我赠给你们这对带有玛拉神圣赐福的对戒，愿它们在你们的新生活中保佑你们。

String.Source: What are you looking at?
But when I craft something, a part of me can be in your hand. Be your sword, or your shield. So you never have to go at it alone.
String.Dest: 但当我倒腾东西的时候, 我可以搭你一只手. 成为你的利刃，你的盾牌。所以你不必事必躬亲.

String.Source: Or 3, or 4, or maybe the rest of our lives. I'm starting to miss living in a warmer climate, although I'm not ready to see my disapproving mother.
String.Dest: 或者3，或者4，或许是我们剩下的时光. 我开始想念在温暖气候下的生活了, 尽管我还没准备好去见我那恼人的老妈.

String.Source: I'll shoulder some of your burden.
String.Dest: 我会帮你减轻些负重的。

String.Source: So when I meet someone like yourself, sometimes I might come across as a bit too forward. I really just want to know more about your adventures.
String.Dest: 有时候我遇见像你这样的人的话会积极一点……我真的只是想了解一下你的冒险而已。

String.Source: Disappointing.
Damn you!
I'd say my first love was the Hero of Kvatch, but that doesn't really count. You can't really love a dead person.
String.Dest: 我想说我的初恋是科瓦奇城的英雄, 但那次当不得真. 你不能真的爱上一个死人.

String.Source: Are you joking?
I may be an apprentice, but I come from a long line of legendary blacksmiths, and as part of my pilgrimage, I've trained with many more.
String.Dest: 我或许确实只是个学徒，但我来自于一个历史悠久的极富传奇色彩的铁匠世家。并且，在我的人生旅程中，我已身经百战极富经验。

String.Source: A man's worth isn't measured in gold. And there's a difference between what you call a reward and what I consider rewarding.
String.Dest: 人的价值不能用金钱来衡量。而且你对报酬的定义与我愿意支付的报酬之间还是有差异的。

String.Source: And I too would be honored to protect you, even as you protect us all.
String.Dest: 而我也很荣幸能保护您，即使您在保护我们所有人。

String.Source: It's good to have you home, my love. I can't wait to hear about your adventures.
String.Dest: 真高兴你回家了，亲爱的。我等不及要听听你的冒险了。

String.Source: Sovngarde? Where the Nords keep their heroes? I don't like this at all. What hope is left for mortals if even the dead can't have peace?
String.Dest: 松加德？诺德人英灵所在的地方？我可一点儿也不喜欢。如果连死者都无法得到安宁的话，那对于凡人来说也太过于绝望了吧？

String.Source: I'd like that.
I'll rip you in half!
I think that's when the ale spit out of Ulfberth's nose.
String.Dest: 我想那是在从乌弗瑞克的鼻子里喷出麦芽酒的时候。

String.Source: When you do find him, tell him I'll do it. I'll forge the axe. And when it's done, no beast, dragon or otherwise, will be a match for its edge.
String.Dest: 你要是找到了他，告诉他我可以做。我会铸造那把斧头。等到完成的时候，世界上任何的野兽，恶龙还是什么都无法抵挡它的利刃！

String.Source: It may grow in bundles outside our forge, but good luck finding it anywhere else outside Oblivion.
String.Dest: 它大概生长在我们的锻铁炉以外的地方，不过幸运的是在外面湮没世界里到处都能找到。

String.Source: Can I help you?
You're nothing!
To the Dragonborn!
And if you don't care about those people, then think about your wife, and do it for me.
String.Dest: 就算你不在乎那些人的话，想想你的妻子，就帮我这次吧。

String.Source: How are things over there? I didn't meet too many Dunmer in Falkreath. Most cross the border near Windhelm.
String.Dest: 这儿的日子好过吗？我在佛克瑞斯还真没见过几个暗精灵。他们大多跑去风舵城边境了。

String.Source: Any questions?
I prefer to think I'm making that shield for the lonely warriors. To protect them from harm, and to keep them company.
String.Dest: 我更喜欢这种说法：“我正在为一个孤独的战士打造一面盾牌，保护他免受伤害并且永不离弃。”

String.Source: If you're trying to convince me you have a sense of humor, it's working. But I don't know if pushing me toward Lod helps your case.
String.Dest: 如果你在像我证明你有幽默感，唔，还行。但是我不知道如果我和罗德见面能不能帮到你。

String.Source: Our new home! I wonder if there's room for a forge?
String.Dest: 我们的新家！我在想这里有没有空间放个熔炉？

String.Source: What were they like? Were they as wise as the legends say? What did they look like? Wouldn't it be funny if they didn't have beards?
String.Dest: 他们是什么样子的？他们像传说中那样聪明吗？它们看起来像什么？如果他们没有长胡子，那岂不是很有趣？

String.Source: Adrianne didn't think so. She pointed up to the great eagle perched high beside Dragonsreach and said:
String.Dest: 阿德里安娜并不这么认为。她指着龙临堡高处旁筑巢的那只巨鹰，然后说：

String.Source: That's sweet of you to say, my love. I didn't realize you were so inexperienced. But I always knew you were pure.
String.Dest: 你温柔的说，我的宝贝，我没有想到你是如此的缺乏经验，但是我一直都知道你是纯洁的。

String.Source: Really? I didn't think she was his type.
String.Dest: 真的？我可没觉得她会是他的菜。

String.Source: You won't get away!
Fralia Gray-Mane is convinced that the Battle-Borns have abducted one of her sons.
String.Dest: 法利亚·灰鬃认为战狂家族的人绑架了她的儿子。

String.Source: We've stopped. What is it?
String.Dest: 我们停下来了。怎么回事？

String.Source: Worry about yourself.
But I believe in you, and I love you. And I know not even the World Eater can keep you from coming back to me.
String.Dest: 但我相信你，我爱你。我也知道甚至连世界吞噬者也只能让你回到我身边。

String.Source: Be careful!
You think of the people you're doing this for, and it becomes less about killing nameless beasts and bandits, than about the good folks you love.
String.Dest: 你想起了使你做这件事的人们，但随著杀了无数的野兽与强盗，你慢慢遗忘了他们，最后甚至是你所爱的人们。

String.Source: When I think of adventurers, I think of people with passion, with fire, and I channel that emotion when I smith their weapons.
String.Dest: 当我想到冒险家的时候，我就想起了那些热情如火的人们。然后我就能在锻造他们的装备时集中精力了。

String.Source: None escape the Vigil. All come into the light.
String.Dest: 无人能逃避守夜人的审判。一切将昭示于光明之下。

String.Source: That's amazing! Not even a Daedric Prince can stop you from righting the ills of this world. You are every bit the Hero of Kvatch and more.
String.Dest: 太神奇了！就算是魔神也无法阻止你纠正这个世界的弊病 。你绝对是名副其实的科瓦奇的英雄。

String.Source: May you walk on warm sands.
I'll carve you into pieces!
You're welcome.
So here's to you. May your weapons never rust, and your shield never break.
String.Dest: 所以这是给你的。愿你的武器永不生锈，盾牌永不破碎。

String.Source: And when you came home, I'd hammer out any dent, sharpen every edge. So your weapons and our love, would be born anew.
String.Dest: 每当你回家的时候，我都会敲平盔甲上的凹痕，磨利刀剑上的钝处。因此你的武器和我们的爱，都能得以重获新生。

String.Source: When I forge, I think of all the spear-maidens and shield-brothers, braving the snowstorms, with nothing but their armor to keep them company.
String.Dest: 当我锻造的时候,脑子里想的全是战矛少女和盾牌兄弟们冒着暴风雪，不是其他，而是盔甲让他们团结在一起的画面。

String.Source: (Laughs) So you definitely have a sense of humor. And I can tell by just looking at you that you're strong...and brave.
String.Dest: （笑声）你还真有幽默感。我能告诉你的是，在我看来，你又强壮……又勇敢。

String.Source: I heard those mages up in Winterhold have been trying to figure out how many dragons there are in Skyrim.
String.Dest: 我听说冬堡的法师们想要统计天际究竟有多少头龙。

String.Source: As you command.
And so, with that feeling in my heart, I've forged a gift for you.
String.Dest: 因此，这种感觉深埋在我的心间。我打造了个礼物送你。

String.Source: Maybe you ought to head over to Windhelm and see if it's been taken care of.
String.Dest: 也许你应该去风舵城然后看看它是否被搞定了。

String.Source: Of course. Let's go.
Until next time.
The Hero of Kvatch was my idol. But my mother was always quick to remind me that no hero does it alone.
String.Dest: 科瓦奇城的英雄是我的偶像。可妈妈总是马上提醒我没有哪个英雄是一个人成功的。

String.Source: You must hurry my love. And if you must die to reach to Sovngarde, then I will gladly die with you.
String.Dest: 你必须快点儿，吾爱。但如果你必须到松加德去，那么我很乐意和你一起死。

String.Source: I knew you had no need for a weapon. So I made a more personal gift. A pendant that you can wear around your neck, and over your heart.
String.Dest: 我知道你没有需要的武器。所以我做了一个更私人的礼物。一个吊坠,你可以戴在你的脖子上,并将它放在你心上。

String.Source: Ugh!
Of course you do.
You'll beg me to kill you before I'm done!
(Roars)
Yeah.
All right. What is it?
That's why you're a true hero, and someday, the bards will write paeans about your life.
String.Dest: 这就是为什么说你是个真英雄的原因，总有一天，吟游诗人会为你的人生写下颂歌。

String.Source: If the object is deemed worthy, it will earn its place in the underforge, alongside the blades, shields, and hammers of my ancestors.
String.Dest: 如果这东西名副其实，它就可以在地下熔炉获得一席之位，列于我先祖的剑盾锤边上。

String.Source: It will be done.
That's right. I've got a bit of news. Oh, don't worry, it's not that. Although, someday I hope we can have children of our own.
String.Dest: 没错。我有一些好消息。哦，别担心，不是那样的。虽然我希望有一天我们可以拥有我们自己的孩子。

String.Source: Would you like to buy a lady a drink?
String.Dest: 你能请一位女士喝一杯吗？

String.Source: You have a grim look.
I...I didn't mean to waste your time, traveler. I can be a bit of a barnacle when an adventurer is around. I won't be any more of a bother.
String.Dest: 我不是故意要浪费你时间的，旅行者。只是每当附近有冒险家的时候我都会忍不住上前纠缠一番。我不会再多打扰你了。

String.Source: I suppose it is.
I know, I know. Some people think it's the pressure, or the burden of carrying on the family name.
String.Dest: 我懂，我懂。有些人觉得门第观念本身就是一种压力，或者负担。

String.Source: Then that is my task.
I tried baking an apple dumpling yesterday. And no, I didn't fill the insides with hinges and nails. It just tastes like I did.
String.Dest: 我昨天试着做了一个苹果派。而且里面没有加铰链和钉子。还是熟悉的味道啊。

String.Source: Just tell me what kind of metal and I'll take care of it.
String.Dest: 只要告诉我要什么样的金属，剩下的我包了。

String.Source: What do you need, my love?
Show me what you've got!
You don't stand a chance!
Rumarin, when are you going to give up those bound blades and wield a proper weapon?
String.Dest: 罗米勒，你什么时候才能把那些召唤武器放下改拿一把正常的武器呢？

String.Source: Smart.
And...it didn't attack you? That's crazy. And the Greybeards knew about this all this time? How do we know it isn't helping Alduin?
String.Dest: 而它……没有咬你？这太扯了。那些灰胡子也一直都知道？我们怎么知道它不是在帮助奥杜因呢？

String.Source: In any case, from what it sounds like, this queen would unite Skyrim, and that's bad news for the dragons and the Thalmor.
String.Dest: 总而言之，它的意思是说这位女皇将统一整个天际，那对龙族和梭默来讲可是个坏消息。

String.Source: I agree. I hear all about your adventures from the locals, but not about your past.
String.Dest: 我同意。我从传言中听到的都是你的冒险经历，而不是你的过去。

String.Source: Farewell.
I was thinking we need more space to display your trophies, but it might look like we're showing off. A good hero stays humble.
String.Dest: 我在想是不是得有个大点的空间来展示你的战利品，可那又有点炫耀的感觉是吧。一个正直的英雄应该保持低调。

String.Source: It does seem odd the Nord would just disappear. Maybe you can follow some of your other leads, and find out what happened.
String.Dest: 那个诺德人就这么消失了，这看起来太奇怪了。也许你可以循着一些其他的线索，找出到底发生了什么事。

String.Source: Just name it.
Sure.
Seriously? Wouldn't that make you more of a sellsword than an adventurer? I don't want to imagine I'm forging armor for bandits and profiteers.
String.Dest: 你是认真的吗？那不是把你从冒险者变成佣兵了吗？我可不愿想象自己在为强盗和奸商造装备。

String.Source: One of the boys would end up saying, "Who invited her?" And I'd tell him I was there first. Eventually they just started the game somewhere else.
String.Dest: 最后总有个男孩会问：“是谁邀请她来的？”然后我告诉他是我第一个到那儿的。最后他们只好另找地方玩他们的游戏去了。

String.Source: Huh?
Take care of yourself.
You have quite the appetite, my love. I'll have something for you on the morrow.
String.Dest: 你的胃口不错啊，亲爱的。我明天一早就给你做点好的。

String.Source: (Laughs) Fair enough. Perhaps you ought to talk to Lod then. Although I doubt he has much to say, beyond the color of Dengeir's britches.
String.Dest: (笑声) 很公平。你应该找罗德谈谈。虽然我在怀疑他有很多想说的，不止是讨论丁格尔那只裤子。

String.Source: Will do.
I don't care much for books though. I'm a fairly typical blacksmith in that regard.
String.Dest: 我对书本没什么兴趣。在这方面我是一个相当典型的铁匠。

String.Source: Funny.
Being a true hero, I take it you would have run all the way to Kvatch if you had to. Hopefully it was a little easier than that.
String.Dest: 做个真英雄吧，我觉得在毫无选择的情况下你一定会排除万难抵达科瓦奇城。但愿这比那个简单一些。

String.Source: I'll be with you in spirit, my love. In the steel you hold in your hand, and the memories you keep in your heart.
String.Dest: 我的心与你同在，亲爱的，和你的剑一起握在你手里，和你的记忆一起藏在你心中。

String.Source: Sweetheart, you should let me make your horse some proper shoes, keep him from getting injured on these cobbled roads.
String.Dest: 甜心，你应该给我们的马找些合适的鞋子，这样它就不会再因踏过鹅卵石的小路而上受伤了。

String.Source: You mean Elisif? I'm not keen on making weapons for figureheads. I much rather make a weapon for General Tullius.
String.Dest: 你指艾利西弗？我不会给傀儡王做武器。我选择给图留斯将军做武器。

String.Source: All right.
(Laughs) Or they might die from the smell. I've repaired some armor where I had to stick redworts up my nose to get anywhere near it.
String.Dest: (笑声) 他们可能会被这气味熏死的。我在鼻子够得着甜麦汁的地方修好了一些盔甲。

String.Source: Running out of room, eh? I'll be glad to help.
String.Dest: 没有空间了吗？我很乐意帮忙。

String.Source: Oh, I never said I wouldn't. Forge the axe, not strangle a small animal. That's just disgusting.
String.Dest: 哦，我可从没说过我不会。我打造一把斧头，才不是为了杀死什么小动物的。这样做只会让人感到恶心。

String.Source: Oh, lots of things. Take a look.
String.Dest: 哦，我这儿有很多东西呢。看看吧。

String.Source: But enough about me. What about you? Any family?
String.Dest: 我的事儿说够了，谈谈你吧？你有什么家人吗？

String.Source: How's business today?
Isn't there some business you should be tending to?
You want another one of those?
Well, I did see something interesting not long ago.
String.Dest: 我不久前就见过些有意思的事。

String.Source: Yes, mother.
If you say so.
Some of the local miners brought back some real stubborn pieces of ore. It'll take some extra care to turn them into proper weapons.
String.Dest: 当地的一些矿工带回一些真正难处理的矿石。我会特别照料它们，让它们成为合适的武器。

String.Source: She pointed up to that great eagle and said "Child, if this is the Skyforge, what in Oblivion is that thing?"
String.Dest: 她指向上方的巨大鹰状标饰说道：”孩子，若这是天空熔炉，在湮灭又是什么？“

String.Source: I'll skin you alive!
Is that all you've got?
Yeah?
What now?
Your mother should've taught you that. Which reminds me, I've never asked you about your family, have I?
String.Dest: 你的老妈应该教过你这点才对。哦，这样说起来我好像从来没有问过关于你家庭的事情，对吗？

String.Source: What?
Aye, I did suspect when we met you were some kind of noble. Like a warrior prince, who left the crown to chase adventure.
String.Dest: 啊，当我见到你的时候我猜你是某个贵族，比如说一个勇敢的王子，放下王冠，来寻求冒险。

String.Source: Just to know that I was a part of that, that it was my steel...it just takes your breath away thinking about it.
String.Dest: 只需知道我是其中的一部分,它是我的武器……仅仅是想到它就会让你无法呼吸。

String.Source: It was Mara that first gave birth to all of creation and pledged to watch over us as her children.
String.Dest: 是玛拉赐予我们以至于万物生命，并将我们当做自己的孩子。

String.Source: So is it true then? This whole thing about a descendant of Ysgramor? I'm a bit conflicted.
String.Dest: 所以那么这是真的了？这整件事都是关于一个伊斯格拉谟的后裔的？我在心理斗争。

String.Source: Eventually, he thought enough of me that I should get a proper master. He sent a letter to Whiterun, and I couldn't contain my excitement.
String.Dest: 他想了很多，最终他还是觉得我应该找一个合适的主人。他往白漫城发了一封信，我简直无法抑制住我激动的心情。

String.Source: It's amazing he survived. But I always knew he would.
String.Dest: 他能存活下来真是惊人。尽管我一直相信他能办到的。

String.Source: Exactly.
You must be heartbroken, my love. I'll light an extra candle tonight by the hearth. Maybe it will help show him the way to Sovngarde.
String.Dest: 你一定很伤心，我的爱人。今晚我将会在壁炉旁多点些蜡烛。也许这可以照亮他前往松加德的路。

String.Source: I wish I could've been there in person, walking up the 7,000 steps, seeing Skyrim from the Throat of the World.
String.Dest: 真希望我能亲自去那儿，爬上7000层台阶，然后在世界之喉俯瞰整个天际省。

String.Source: Brilliant. Leave it in the kitchen somewhere where I can see it. I'm sure you'll make good use of it too. You do everything well, my love.
String.Dest: 非常好。把它搁在厨房我能看得见的地方吧，我确信你也会好好利用它的。你什么都做的很好，亲爱的。

String.Source: What? What do you mean?
You do realize we share a bed, right? Your nighttime habits aren't exactly a secret, you know.
String.Dest: 你明白我们共用一张床对吧？你睡觉时的那些小动作对我来说可不是秘密。

String.Source: As the Dragonborn, the savior of Skyrim, you would know the answer better than I.
String.Dest: 龙裔, 天际省的救世主,你比我更知道答案。

String.Source: Then I met Adrianne. I recall looking at her modest setup, and with a straight face telling her how impressive the Skyforge was.
String.Dest: 然后我遇到了阿德里安娜。我不由得回想起那时看到她那端庄的服饰，我绷紧了自己的脸向她说那天空熔炉是多么令人印象深刻。

String.Source: Of course. I wouldn't be a very good blacksmith if I turned down requests, especially from a true hero.
String.Dest: 当然。要是我拒绝了别人的要求，那我就不是一位好铁匠，更何况这可是来自一位真正的英雄的要求。

String.Source: They want to enslave mankind because they think we're inferior.
String.Dest: 他们想奴役人类，因为他们认为我们是低等的存在。

String.Source: And a hero you are. You're the dragonborn, the one the people have been waiting for.
String.Dest: 而你是个英雄。你是龙裔，我一直在等待的人。

String.Source: But I'm guessing we'll only have so much blood to work with. In that case, we need to brew a special oil, one that doesn't contaminate the liquid.
String.Dest: 但是我猜我们只有这么多血液来工作了。这样的话，我们需要酿造一种特殊的油，一种不会污染这个液体的油。

String.Source: And the braggart named Ragnar was boastful no moooooree... when his ugly red head rolled around on the floor!
String.Dest: 牛皮王拉格纳不能再自夸……他的红脑袋摔成了一堆渣！

String.Source: Stendarr's Light purify you of your ills.
String.Dest: 斯丹达尔的光芒将净化你的疾病。

String.Source: I got off the docks with nothing but a sack over my shoulder. I never told Beirand who my family was.
String.Dest: 我只背着一个麻袋离开了码头。我从没有告诉贝尔兰德的家族是什么。

String.Source: Because I refuse to believe this is goodbye. I'll be waiting for you right here, as I always have.
String.Dest: 因为我不相信这是再见。我会永远在这儿等着你。

String.Source: Even when every other farm in the hold is barely scraping by, the harvest at Rorikstead is always bountiful.
String.Dest: 即使是冬堡的农民都没有半点收成时，洛里斯泰德的收成依然可观。

String.Source: But this land is ours and we'll see it wiped clean. Of the scourge that has sullied our hopes and our dreams.
String.Dest: 这片大地是我们的，洁白而干净。任何灾难只会加强我们的信念跟梦想！

String.Source: So we're married! All that's left now is deciding on a place to live.
String.Dest: 所以，我们结婚了！现在剩下的是决定住的地方。

String.Source: That...would be me. It's an honor...I suppose.
String.Dest: 那……应该是我。是个荣誉吧……我觉得。

String.Source: They're probably trying to scare us into giving them more money and influence, so they can save us from the dragons threat.
String.Dest: 他们大概想吓唬我们，好让我们因为恐惧而交出更多的钱。

String.Source: You obviously don't know me very well. Threats won't work on me.
String.Dest: 你显然不了解你的妻子，我是不畏惧威胁的。

String.Source: Enjoy your last breath!
That's what I'd be thinking right before it turned me into roast. Which is why you're an adventurer, and I'm a blacksmith.
String.Dest: 那就是我在自己被烧成灰前考虑好的念头。这就是为什么你是个冒险家，而我只是个铁匠。

String.Source: But when a new adventurer comes into town, I like to head on over to the inn, and maybe strike up a conversation.
String.Dest: 但是当一个新的冒险家来到镇上时，我就喜欢往酒馆儿里钻，也许能跟他搭讪成功呢。

String.Source: You want a drink?
Oh, I'm sorry. Adrianne and her husband run Warmaiden's, a smithing shop in Whiterun.
String.Dest: 哦，我很抱歉。阿德里安娜和她的丈夫在雪漫城经营着一家铁匠铺：战争少女。

String.Source: It's not like I'm going to leave any nails or metal shavings in your soup, but I pretty much just follow the recipe.
String.Dest: 我当然不太可能在你的汤里落下什么钉子刀子之类，不过基本上也只能按配方做而已。

String.Source: Did you hear me?
It was made not long after the Oblivion Crisis, and next to the old memorial and the Hero's Statue, it's one of the most iconic landmarks in Kvatch.
String.Dest: 它建造于湮灭危机过去不久之后，就在古老的纪念碑和英雄的雕像旁边，它是科瓦奇城这是最具代表性的建筑。

String.Source: You puny weakling!
An Orc follows to the death.
I might have had too much to drink. I don't think I'll be working the forge tomorrow.
String.Dest: 我可能有点喝过头了，恐怕明天是没法上炉干活了。

String.Source: But the truth is, it's the clients. It's not like the Skyforge here. If I took over the family business, I would be crafting swords for nobles.
String.Dest: 但真实情况是，我的客户群体会发生变化。我的铁匠铺并不像这里的天空熔炉一样，一旦我接管了家族生意，那我就只能为贵族们打造武器了。

String.Source: You look like an adventurous one. I bet we're kindred spirits, you and I.
String.Dest: 你看起来像一个爱冒险的人。我觉得我们志趣相投，你和我。

String.Source: My name's Isobel, by the way. Pleased to meet you.
String.Dest: 顺便一提，我的名字是伊莎贝尔。很高兴认识你。

String.Source: I can't believe we let provincials like you wander Skyrim.
String.Dest: 真不敢相信我们让你这样的乡巴佬在天际省四处游荡！

String.Source: Not so tough now, are you?
What about you, do you have family back home? Any brothers or sisters?
String.Dest: 你呢？你有家人回来么？兄弟或者姐妹？

String.Source: It's as if some people don't know what a hero is. Unbelievable.
String.Dest: 这就好像人们不知道英雄是啥一样。难以置信。

String.Source: Amazing how much fire was in their eyes. They must've really hated this war-teacher who tortured them.
String.Dest: 他们的眼中燃烧着多麽愤恨的火焰啊。他们肯定特别讨厌这个把他们折磨得生不如死的战争导师。

String.Source: Do your worst!
Fair enough.
My, that must be strange. I think I'd go mad if I saw the sun rise and set from the same location. That has to happen every now and then.
String.Dest: 天，那可就太奇怪了。我要是看到太阳从同一个地方升起和落下一定会发疯。而这却是时不时的就发生一次。

String.Source: Waiting.
Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: To the next fight.
They seem to think it's at least a dozen, but I'm sure they're exaggerating.
String.Dest: 他们似乎觉得至少有一打，不过那太夸张了点。

String.Source: You need to not bother me.
That's not true. A great blacksmith is just as rare as a legendary hero.
String.Dest: 不是那么回事，一个真正的好铁匠可是像传说中的英雄一样罕见。

String.Source: Is it good fortune? The blessings of the Divines? Who knows?
String.Dest: 这算宝藏？圣灵的赐福吗？谁知道呢？

String.Source: I enjoyed this talk. We should definitely have more, as long as it doesn't take away from your duties.
String.Dest: 我喜欢这么聊天儿。我们应该多聊一会儿，只要这不会让你擅离职守。

String.Source: And other things you can only share with the one you love. I won't give you any hints, but I'm sure you can use your imagination.
String.Dest: 而其他的事你只可以跟你的爱人分享。我不会给你任何暗示，但我确定你肯定能发挥你的想象力。

String.Source: But listen to me, rattling on about my own family. It occurs to me now that I've never asked you where you're from.
String.Dest: 但你在听我说话，听我喋喋不休地说着我自己的家庭。这让我想到，我还从来没问过你从哪儿来呢。

String.Source: There's been some attacks late at night, mostly on the livestock around town. I better forge some better blades for the guards, just in case.
String.Dest: 这段时间的夜晚已经发生了好几次针对镇子周边的家畜的袭击了。为了以防万一，我最好还是给守卫们打造点好的武器。

String.Source: I can sympathize. I know families can fight over a lot of things, sometimes even the littlest ones.
String.Dest: 我能理解。我明白家人之间会吵架，有时甚至只是为了一些鸡毛蒜皮的小事。

String.Source: It was exciting, I'll say that. I've never quenched a blade in a living person before, and I doubt I'll ever do it again.
String.Dest: 那可真是太刺激了，我绝对从来没有拿活人做过锻造冷淬，不过恐怕也不会再做了。

String.Source: Suit yourself.
The dragons are the real threat. Bigger than the Aldmeri, bigger than even the Oblivion Crisis. That's where your focus should be.
String.Dest: 龙才是真正的威胁，先祖神州啊湮灭危机什么的跟它相比都不值一提。这才是你应该注意的重点啊。

String.Source: Things are busy in Kvatch. After what happened in the Great War, and with the Thalmor having gained control of southern Hammerfell...
String.Dest: 科瓦奇城的形式还真是变幻莫测啊。刚忙完世界大战那档子事儿，紧接着又跟梭默一起取得了落锤省南部的控制权……

String.Source: This bow is my finest work. In it is everything I am. Take it with you, my love, and let its aim be as true as our bond.
String.Dest: 这把弓是我最好的杰作，里面倾注了我全部的心血。带上它，亲爱的。愿它的准星如我们的束缚一样真诚、永恒。

String.Source: You mean everything to me as well. I think my family's pretty mad at me for marrying you instead of inheriting the forge, but I don't care.
String.Dest: 你对我而言也是重于一切啊。虽然我的家人可能因为我嫁了你却没继承锻炉而生气，可我不在乎。

String.Source: Really?
Aye, that it is love. Those nights at the forge can make you regret your chosen craft.
String.Dest: 赞成，这都是爱。那些在熔炉的岁月会让你为曾经选择的手艺而感叹。

String.Source: Lod, I'm thinking about using fire salts to provide extra heat to the forge. What do you think?
String.Dest: 罗德，我想用火盐给熔铁炉加热。你怎么看？

String.Source: That wasn't what I meant.
I'll need to know what kind of metal, and the rest I'll tailor to your weight. You've lost a few pounds, haven't you. Don't think I didn't notice.
String.Dest: 我需要了解用什么种类的金属，然后我要根据你的体重来定制。你瘦了几磅是不是？不要认为我没发现。

String.Source: Me and Lod? (Laughs) By the Eight, no. He's old enough to be my grandfather, I think, and slow enough to be my anvil.
String.Dest: 我和罗德？(笑声) 八圣灵在上，当然不是啦。他老得都能当我的祖父了。而且行动缓慢到都能当我的铁砧了。

String.Source: Hey, watch it!
It's just a matter of time before they march into Cyrodiil again. So my mother is working the forge day and night in preparation.
String.Dest: 他们再次进军赛瑞迪尔只是时间问题。所以我的妈妈日夜打造装备以作准备。

String.Source: Is Rumarin married? We ought to set him up with someone nice.
String.Dest: 罗米勒结婚了吗？我们应该给他介绍某个好人家。

String.Source: Our new home! I wonder if there's room for a forge?
String.Dest: 我们的新家！我想知道这儿有熔炉吗？

String.Source: This isn't over.
Looking to protect yourself, or deal some damage?
String.Dest: 在找保护自己的东西，还是砍人的东西？

String.Source: Not just any family. Ever heard of the The Star-Blood Forge? My family has been the caretaker of it for centuries.
String.Dest: 不是个普普通通的家族。听说过星血熔炉吗？我的家族经营了上百年。

String.Source: Let's go.
What about family? Do you have any brothers or sisters?
String.Dest: 那么家庭呢？你有兄弟姐妹吗？

String.Source: A blacksmith's steel is a blacksmith's pride. But for a true hero, it's not the metals you forge, but the bonds.
String.Dest: 铁匠的产品就是铁匠的脸面。而对于真正的英雄，你的荣耀不在于锻造的器物，而是缔结的盟约。

String.Source: We're the children of Skyrim, and we fight all our lives. And when Sovngarde beckons, every one of us dies!
String.Dest: 我们是天际的子民，我们一辈子都在战斗，只要松加德传来召唤，我们就英勇赴义。

String.Source: It's alright. Although we've gotten a lot less visitors after the dragon attacked Helgen.
String.Dest: 没问题。尽管在巨龙袭击了海尔根之后我们这里就没什么参观者了。

String.Source: Now you'll pay!
Sounds like some dark magic. Still, it doesn't matter where you started, but where you finished, and this is a fine place to be.
String.Dest: 听起来似乎是某种黑魔法。不过，你从哪开始的并不重要，在哪结束才比较重要。到了这步你也应该结束了。

String.Source: I did, to the one who knew you anyway. I told him I would love to forge his legendary axe, but he needed to fetch me some bloodgrass first.
String.Dest: 我会做的。反正那个人认识你。我会告诉他我很乐意给他造把传奇斧子，但首先他得给我拿些血草来。

String.Source: Orgnar!
Excellent. I think you'll be glad that you made this decision.
String.Dest: 太棒了。我想你会庆幸你做了这个决定。

String.Source: I think I'm going to get another drink.
But I don't want to sound ungrateful. I consider myself pretty lucky to have you.
String.Dest: 但是我不想听上去忘恩负义。我能拥有你是多么幸运啊。

String.Source: Right behind you.
What about you? Who was your first?
String.Dest: 那你呢？等等你到底是谁来着？

String.Source: That's sort of what this pilgrimage is about. I'm here not just to learn from the masters, but to learn about myself.
String.Dest: 这就是朝圣之路。我来这儿不仅仅是想从大师们那儿学到一些东西，更是想对自己进行进一步挖掘。

String.Source: The legends are true then...By Akatosh! You're the Dragonborn! And I'm your wife! Your blacksmith!
String.Dest: 那传说是真的……阿卡托什啊! 你是龙裔！而我是你的妻子！你的铁匠！

String.Source: Can't do it.
The forge is old, and requires a lot of maintenance just to keep running. Plus it takes up a lot of land, and taxes are charged accordingly.
String.Dest: 这锻铁炉挺旧的了，还得需要大量的维修来保持运作。再加上它占了那么多的地，要交的税可不便宜。

String.Source: I have nothing to say to you. Now move along, or I'll order my guards to attack.
String.Dest: 我没什么和你说的了。现在快走开，不然我叫人来撵你。

String.Source: Here I was, trying to come up with the nerve to go and talk to you, and in the meantime you came over to me. So, what's on your mind?
String.Dest: 我在这儿，好不容易拿出点儿勇气想去找你，就看你迎面朝我走来了。那么，你在想什么？

String.Source: And I will spend the rest of my life with you, whether it's me in your arms, or my sword in your hands.
String.Dest: 无论将来遇到什么样的困难，我将会与你共度余生。

String.Source: I'm not sure that it's news, but lately it seems like every blacksmith in Skyrim is out to prove that he's the equal of Eorlund Gray-Mane.
String.Dest: 我不知道这还算不算新闻，最近好像天际所有的铁匠都想证明自己跟厄伦德·灰鬃不相上下。

String.Source: I couldn't have said it better myself. It's been some time since I've had news from elsewhere in Skyrim. What have you heard?
String.Dest: 我想不出比它再好的了。我上次听到天际其他地方的消息已经是很久以前了。你听说什么了？

String.Source: Why?
If this dragon has committed crimes, I say he should answer for them. But I leave that decision up to you. Whatever you decide, I shall be with you.
String.Dest: 如果这头龙确实犯下了罪行，那他当然得做出解释。不过我将选择权留给你。无论你的决定是如何，我都会听从你的。

String.Source: I understand.
So, I'm here. We can get to know each other first and our drinks second, but the other way is fine too.
String.Dest: 所以说，我在这儿。我们可以先互相了解一下，再开怀畅饮一番，不过还有另一个方式也可以增进我们之间的友谊。

String.Source: I am yours to command.
Go where the challenge is greatest.
String.Dest: 到最有挑战性的地方去。

String.Source: At least, that's what I told my mother. The truth is, I chose Skyrim because of the war, and the chance to forge for true warriors.
String.Dest: 至少我对我母亲就是那样说的。真相是，我选择天际的原因是因为天际正处于战火之中，这可是个为真的勇士锻造的好机会。

String.Source: Just as my mother did, and all my foremothers back to the age when weapons were crafted with stone.
String.Dest: 就如我母亲所做的那样，以及与那些从石器时代开始就一直保持这一传统的我的女性祖先们一样。

String.Source: You've bested me!
That's not exactly how it works. They're quenched in Daedric blood, but the weapons themselves are made here.
String.Dest: 确切地说不是那样。武器确实是用魔族血来冷却的，但打造那些武器的地点是在这儿。

String.Source: You know your history. Fact is, they took a lot of cities, Kvatch included. But my mother says they never would have held it.
String.Dest: 你所知道的是你的历史。事实上，他们占领了很多城市，其中包括了科瓦奇城。但我的母亲说，他们从未占领过科瓦奇城。

String.Source: No.
But right now makes it worth all the sweat and tears. I'll suffer all the twists and turns to be here, at the end, with the one I love.
String.Dest: 但是现在，它值得我所有的甜蜜与泪水。我愿意承受一切波折险阻，与我的爱人走到最后。

String.Source: Give up while you still can!
String.Dest: 趁你还有命的时候，投降吧！

String.Source: It's not really a fair comparison, if you ask me.
String.Dest: 要我说，这根本没有可比性。

String.Source: Agh! Enough! This ends now!
What in the world?
When I craft a shield, I think of the soldier's child praying for a safe return. For a sword, I envision a man getting revenge for a brother's death.
String.Dest: 当我打造盾牌，我会想到士兵的孩子祈祷他们的父亲平安归来。而对于剑，我会想象到有人会为他兄弟的死报仇。

String.Source: I wonder how the family is doing back in Kvatch. After all, the forge is still important, even if the clients aren't.
String.Dest: 我不知道这家人回科瓦奇城做些什么。毕竟锻造厂才是最重要的。即使是客人也没那重要。

String.Source: What's on your mind?
Oh, hello there. What can I do for you? Blades, gauntlets, I can forge anything you need.
String.Dest: 哦，你好，欢迎光临。我能帮您做什么吗？武器，护甲，我能为您锻造您想要的。

String.Source: By the Eight, was there something wrong with one of your meals? I should've asked you before I prepared it.
String.Dest: 八圣灵啊，你们的食物是不是有问题啊？我本应该在准备前问你。

String.Source: I had some good teachers.
Selling highly decorative, high-end craftsmanship is the only way the business can survive.
String.Dest: 卖贵重装饰和高档工艺是商人唯一的活路。

String.Source: Khajiit will follow.
When you do, you can tell them I'll do it. I'll forge the axe. And when it's done, no beast, dragon or otherwise, will be a match for its edge.
String.Dest: 当你这样做的时候，你可以告诉他们我会这样做的。我会锻造这把斧子的。当它完成时，就没有野兽、龙或其他东西能与斧子的锋利匹敌了。

String.Source: But I don't think that applies to you, my love. I can tell that you're the sort of person who will always do what's right, even when it's hard.
String.Dest: 但我认为这不适合你。我的至爱。即使在困难的时候，我也可以告诉你，你做的永远是对的。

String.Source: You must be a Stormcloak through and through to request that one.
String.Dest: 你一定是风暴斗篷的人吧，不然不会点这首歌的。

String.Source: It's funny, I thought having to take care place like this would make me lose my smithing touch, but I think I've gotten better.
String.Dest: 说来挺有意思的，我本来还以为照管这个家会让我生疏了打铁的手感，但似乎我的手艺反倒有所进步。

String.Source: Come on!
Our story practically writes itself. All that's left is for you to save the town!(Laughs)
String.Dest: 我们的故事几乎是自己写出来的。对你来说剩下的就是去拯救一个城镇了！（大笑）

String.Source: That's why I'm in Skyrim. With the war, and talk of dragons...maybe I'll meet the next great legend right here in Falkreath. Maybe that might be you.
String.Dest: 那就是为什么我在天际省。这场战争，还有龙……也许我会在佛克瑞斯迎来一个伟大的传奇吧。或许那传奇就是你。

String.Source: No!
That's what I do when I forge. I've made the same steel sword a thousand times over, but every time it's different, because of who it's for.
String.Dest: 这就是当我锻造时我会做的事。我已经成千次地打造了同一款剑，但是每次是不同的，因为我给的人是不同的。

String.Source: And here you are, back from eternity, none the worse for wear. I love you.
String.Dest: 给你，一直到永远，永远也不会改变，我爱你。

String.Source: You lead, I'll follow.
You've got to admire their courage, doing something like that with dragons on the loose and a war going on.
String.Dest: 你不得不佩服他们的勇气，能在有龙出没，战争横行的时候在外面闯荡。

String.Source: Son of a...
I guess you don't have potatoes in your ears after all. Just make sure we get a fresh batch in soon.
String.Dest: 看来你耳朵没被塞住。尽快给我们弄一批新鲜的来吧。

String.Source: Our hero, our hero, claims a warrior's heart.
Some say the ship suffered damage to her hull when she struck an iceberg, and Captain Safia can't afford the repairs.
String.Dest: 有人说船撞上了冰山，船体受损，而萨非亚船长付不起维修费。

String.Source: Blades, gauntlets, I can forge anything you need.
String.Dest: 剑，护手。你想要什么我都可以给你打造出来。

String.Source: I'll tell you what I told the others. The forge in Kvatch is special, and it isn't just the blood.
String.Dest: 我将会告诉你我对别人说了什么。科瓦奇城中的熔炉不同于一般，而且不仅仅是血液。

String.Source: (Laughs) You're too funny, my love. I'm sure you were Gleda's first as well. First person, anyhow.
String.Dest: (笑声) 你太有趣了,我的甜心。我相信你是格丽达的第一个人。总之是第一个。

String.Source: I mean, Markarth is a Dwarven ruin, but the Nords there still drink mead and scratch their bellies just like everywhere else.
String.Dest: 我的意思是， 马卡斯城是一个矮人废墟，但这儿的诺德人仍然把蜂蜜酒灌进他们的肚子里，就像他们在其他地方所做的一样丝毫不在乎这里的巨大威胁。

String.Source: The Vigil will be watching you.
We are bound together, and we fight together. My hands are yours, my love. Take this gift and vanquish your enemies.
String.Dest: 我俩注定相伴一生，共同作战。我的手就是你的手，亲爱的。拿着这礼物，然后去打败你的敌人吧。

String.Source: Oh, come on, didn't your mother ever tell you not to judge a blade by its gloss?
String.Dest: 噢，得了，你妈妈没告诉过你不要以貌取剑吗？

String.Source: That's what they say.
Anyhow, I can talk about smithing all day, but I'm sure you'd rather not. Do you have family back in Elsweyr? Any brothers or sisters?
String.Dest: 总之，我可以谈论打铁的事儿一整天，但我很肯定你不想这么干。你有家人在艾斯维尔吗？你有兄弟姐妹吗？

String.Source: Some people will tell you that all heroes are flawed, that they have moments of weakness just like the rest of us.
String.Dest: 有些人会告诉你，所有的英雄都是有缺点的，他们虚弱的时候跟我们其他人一个样。

String.Source: You're a talker, eh?
I figured. A lot of the Imperial cities share similarities, but given Kvatch's history, folks are tight knit, and we know each other by first name.
String.Dest: 我想。很多帝国的城市都有相似之处，但科瓦奇城的历史中，人们关系密切，我们认识每个人，而且都直呼其名。

String.Source: What do you need?
Are you sure? It's much easier to make a new one. Re-forging is something you do with family heirlooms and the like.
String.Dest: 你确定？造一把新的不是更简单么？你怎么搞得像是要打造出一只传家宝来似的。

String.Source: I would love to, Olette. When you're old enough.
String.Dest: 我很想那么做，欧雷特。当你再大点儿的时候。

String.Source: I would be an artist more than a blacksmith. There'd be no blood on my blades, and no chinks in my armor.
String.Dest: 我会变成一个艺术家，而不是一名铁匠。我铸的刀刃将不能痛饮热血，我做的盔甲将没有累累战痕。

String.Source: Drink up, my boy! Drink to those who have fallen! May their souls find their way to Sovngarde!
String.Dest: 喝吧，兄弟们！敬那些死去的人！愿他们的灵魂能找到去松加德的路。

String.Source: I'm Lod's apprentice. Although I've been his for less than a season.
String.Dest: 我是罗德的学徒。不过我作他学徒的时间还不到一个季度。

String.Source: More importantly, you're my husband, and the only person I've ever wanted.
String.Dest: 更重要的是，你是我丈夫，是那个唯一让我朝思暮想的人。

String.Source: Well, I did hear that the Argonians have been banned from living inside the walls of Windhelm.
String.Dest: 我听说他们禁止亚龙人住在风盔城里。

String.Source: It's well known that on the 25th of Evening Star, the Hero of Kvatch comes to town on a great big sled and gives presents to all the children.
String.Dest: 众所周知，在夜星月25日，科瓦奇的英雄(注：四代主角）将会乘着雪橇给镇上的所有小孩送上礼物。

String.Source: It's a long story.
You speak to a Vigilant of Stendarr. Cavort with any Daedra, and we will hunt you down.
String.Dest: 你正在和一位斯丹达尔的守备人说话。只要你胆敢与魔族为伍，我们就要消灭你。

String.Source: Only true Imperials request that one.
String.Dest: 只有帝国人才点这首歌。

String.Source: The what?
I'd never forge arms against the Empire. But the chance to forge a weapon to slay a legendary beast? Aye, that's a job for your wife.
String.Dest: 我从未打造过武器去对抗帝国。但有机会去打造一把武器杀死传说中的野兽？哦是啊，这正是你妻子的工作。

String.Source: For instance, your favorite book, or something heavy, like your first love. I'll go first.
String.Dest: 例如，你喜欢的书，或者有分量的东西，就像你的初恋。我就先开始了。

String.Source: Argh!
I probably would've been staring at it. No, not just staring. I'd be completely awestruck. I mean, a dragon. A fairy tale come to life.
String.Dest: 我可能会一直盯着它。不，不只是盯着。我会被完全被震撼的。嘿，那可是一头龙。活生生的童话里的生物。

String.Source: The Mercy of Stendarr does not extend to Daedra worshippers.
String.Dest: 斯丹达尔的怜悯是绝不会降临到魔族崇拜者的身上的。

String.Source: I originally wanted to work under Eorlund Gray-Mane, but I found Adrianne Avenicci to be just as talented a teacher.
String.Dest: 我本来想在厄仑德．灰鬃的指导下工作，但我发现阿德里安娜同样是个有才能的老师。

String.Source: I'm on a sort of pilgrimage you see. When I'm finished, my family expects me to return to Cyrodiil and take over the forge.
String.Dest: 如你所见，我在朝圣之旅的路上。当我完成的时候，我的家人希望我能回赛瑞迪尔并接管那家铁匠铺。

String.Source: Do you think that's how a marriage works? You make threats and your wife does your bidding? You still have a lot to learn, my love.
String.Dest: 你认为怎么做婚姻才能完美呢？你出口威胁而你的妻子唯命是从吗？你还有好些东西要学，亲爱的。

String.Source: Following.
Lod, Adrianne Avenicci and Beirand of Solitude will all vouch for my skill. Or you can take a chance on me yourself.
String.Dest: 罗德、阿德里安娜·阿文尼奇以及独孤城的贝尔兰德都能为我的技艺担保。或者你可以赌一把，亲自在我这儿试试。

String.Source: You know I love you, but you're going to have to change your politics if you want this to work.
String.Dest: 你也知道我爱你，但如果你想接下这个工作的话，必须改变你的政治立场。

String.Source: Of course, she would never admit such a thing. Captain Safia is far too proud a woman for that.
String.Dest: 当然，她永远不会承认的。萨非亚船长的骄傲不允许她承认。

String.Source: And that's something that just can't be replaced.
String.Dest: 而这件事情恰好不能被替换。

String.Source: Some even say the forge itself is haunted. Specifically, with the soul of one my ancestors.
String.Dest: 一些人甚至说这铁匠铺本身就是闹鬼的。具体的说，是我一位祖先的灵魂。

String.Source: Well met.
Well, that's a scary way to start a conversation. What's the matter?
String.Dest: 呃，你这么搭讪可够吓人的。怎么啦？

String.Source: A blade crafted with hate would be sharper, but heavier than a blade crafted with love.
String.Dest: 带着恨意做成的剑会更加锋利，但却比通过爱意制作而成的更加沉重。

String.Source: Under the authority of Mara, the Divine of Love, I declare this couple to be wed.
String.Dest: 在玛拉和圣灵的见证下，我宣布这对情侣结为夫妇。

String.Source: But you aren't just an adventurer, my love. You're the Dragonborn. You must do what is right.
String.Dest: 但你不只是冒险者，吾爱。你是龙裔。你得做正确之事。

String.Source: Now that's a strange request. Not in and of itself, but you're the third person to ask me that this week.
String.Dest: 这还真是个奇怪的请求。到不是因为这个请求本身奇怪，它奇怪的地方在于你是本周第三个向我提出这一请求的人了。

String.Source: Here. I got this for you. Just a small token of my gratitude.
String.Dest: 来，这个送给你，只是个表达我心意的小礼物。

String.Source: You need to add a bit of oil to keep the thin sections from cracking, because otherwise the steam will get between the water and the blade.
String.Dest: 你得在这个细小的零件上加点油以防其裂开，因为如果不那么做的话蒸汽就会从水和刀口之间冒出来了。

String.Source: Here you are, my love. I actually think my cooking has improved since you brought me that book. Of course, I'll let you be the judge.
String.Dest: 尝尝这个，亲爱的。我真觉得你带那本书给我后我的厨艺提高了。当然，高不高，由你说了算喽。

String.Source: Are you sure?
What is it now?
But I will say this: I've never been too forgiving of criminals. Mercy, I believe in, but not so much in redemption.
String.Dest: 但我要说：我从不会宽恕罪犯。我相信怜悯，但保释并不在其中。

String.Source: I just hope if you have family, they don't feel the same. Otherwise they won't ever be meeting mine.
String.Dest: 我只是希望，如果你有家人的话，他们不会有同样的感觉。另一方面，他们也永远不可能遇到我。

String.Source: What are your thoughts on all this?
Aye, I'm considering it. It's always been my dream to forge great weapons like this.
String.Dest: 是的，我是在考虑。我一直想锻造这样的伟大武器。

String.Source: Still, it makes me jealous that she stole my love's first kiss. (Sigh) If only we met sooner. How many years did we lose trying to find each other?
String.Dest: 然而，我仍免不了因为她偷走了我爱人的初吻而妒火中烧。 (叹气) 相见恨晚啊。在我们寻找彼此时，多少岁月匆匆流逝？

String.Source: That's what happens when you grow up on stories about the Hero of Kvatch, closing Oblivion gates and saving the world without a single companion.
String.Dest: 那就是你在听着英雄科瓦奇孤身一人关闭湮灭之门拯救世界的故事长大时所发生的事。

String.Source: So this is our home. It's beautiful. I can't think of a better place to spend my days, and a better person to spend them with.
String.Dest: 所以这是我们的家。太棒了。我想不出一个更好的地方来度过我人生中的最美好时光，也找不出一个更好的人来陪我走过这些时光了。

String.Source: Liar!
And so then came the clashing and slashing of steel, as the brave lass Matilda charged in full of zeal!
String.Dest: 一阵金属碰撞叮叮当当，勇敢的女孩玛提尔达战意高涨！

String.Source: When the day comes that I must return to Kvatch, I won't have to tell my mother of my intentions. I need only forge them.
String.Dest: 当我必须回到科瓦奇城那天到来时，我不会告诉母亲我的意向。我只需要忘记他们。

String.Source: Remember when we first met? I told you it was always my dream to forge something for a true hero, and a true love.
String.Dest: 还记得我们什么时候相遇的吗？我跟你说，我一直梦想打造什么东西去给一名真正的英雄，和我真正的爱人。

String.Source: Gods strike you down.
Seriously? You're not from Kvatch, are you? I would remember someone like you. After all, when we met in Falkreath, it was love at first sight.
String.Dest: 说真的？你不是从科瓦奇城来的，对不？我会记得你这样的人的。毕竟，我们在佛克瑞斯见面时，那是一见钟情。

String.Source: You can't win this!
String.Dest: 就你这两下子还想获胜?！

String.Source: Hyargh!
Ready to get moving?
True, the Nord said as much. "No true-blooded Nord would challenge the kin of Ysgramor."
String.Dest: 正是这样，这诺德人也说， 没有热血的诺德人才会挑战伊斯格拉莫的亲戚。

String.Source: Not impressed!
The suffering the Daedra cause will not go unpunished.
String.Dest: 魔族会为他们亲手造成的苦难付出代价。

String.Source: Citizen.
Think about it this way. Ever time you slay a bandit, it's another person who won't get robbed on the road, or kidnapped and held ransom.
String.Dest: 这么说吧。每当你杀掉了一个强盗，就会改变另一个人在半路上惨遭抢劫，或是被绑架勒索的命运。

String.Source: Wonderful. Soon we'll have the latest section of the Edda complete. Keep up the good work.
String.Dest: 太好了。很快我们就能完成诗歌集的最后一节了。继续加油。

String.Source: What do you need to take?
I'll not argue that. Heard any interesting gossip lately?
String.Dest: 我不否认。最近有什么八卦吗？

String.Source: Make it quick.
One of the scryers was saying it's going to be a bit chilly tomorrow. Don't know if I believe in that stuff, but bring some furs just in case.
String.Dest: 一个占卜者说明天会有点儿冷。不知道我该不该相信那种东西，但还是带些毛皮以防万一吧。

String.Source: Think nothing of it.
Are you positive? You know I don't like being lied to.
String.Dest: 你肯定吗？你知道我不喜欢被人骗。

String.Source: (Laughs) I probably shouldn't have used the word "haunted." It's not like that at all. She's more of a guardian spirit.
String.Dest: (笑声)我也许不该用“闹鬼”这个词儿。根本不是那么回事。她更像是一个守护神。

String.Source: Perhaps someone with a good laugh.
Safe journeys, my love.
(Laughs) Yeah, the kids stopped asking me to play after a while. But I was always at the courtyard anyway, so it caused some confusion.
String.Dest: (笑声)是啊，孩子们停下来，问我要不要玩一会儿。但无论如何我也一直呆在庭院里，所以引发了一些混乱。

String.Source: Lead the way.
Both to the Empire and to Dengeir. Although I guess that puts him at odds with himself.
String.Dest: 向帝国和丹格尔两者效忠。我想这使他违背了自己誓言。

String.Source: I hope it isn't anything like that. You should make a list of what you can and can't eat, and I'll make sure to keep it out of your meals.
String.Dest: 我希望事情并非如此。你应该列张表记录是否食用物品，而我按表来控制你的饮食。

String.Source: And it's one thing for me to say it now, and another thing for you to carry it with you.
String.Dest: 我就强调一点，别的事你看着办吧。

String.Source: I've heard that in Orc Strongholds, the forge wife will craft a weapon for the chief on their wedding day.
String.Dest: 我听说，在兽人堡垒，做铁匠的妻子会在婚礼日为丈夫打造一件武器。

String.Source: My blood's calm. I prefer it boiling.
String.Dest: 我的鲜血都要凝固了，我宁愿它沸腾。

String.Source: You hand me the same materials, and I'll probably make a club with the nails sticking out of it.
String.Dest: 你给了我同样的材料，我可能会做一把粘满钉子尖朝外的狼牙棒。

String.Source: Aye, it's been a while since I've come down here. Ever since that Thalmor showed up, I get sort of worried about her and Bolund getting into it.
String.Dest: 是啊，我来这里也有些日子了。当梭默出现的时候，我开始担心她和布伦德陷入其中。

String.Source: Just give up!
But it'd still be really hard to forge if everything was shifting under your feet. It's enough to make a girl learn magic.
String.Dest: 当一切在你眼前一闪而过时这还是很难啊。不过这对一个学魔法的女孩足够了。

String.Source: Huzzah!
But I'm getting ahead of myself. First, I need to meet that person, and second, I need to improve as a blacksmith.
String.Dest: 不过我好像想太远了。首先，我需要遇到那个人，其次，作为一名铁匠我还需要有所提高。

String.Source: I don't think we'll run into any problems though. Some might say that's naive, but those people just haven't found the right person.
String.Dest: 不过我不认为我们会遇到任何问题。有些人可能会说这很天真，但只不过是他们还没找到对的那个人罢了。

String.Source: Hello there.
Apparently, the Red Wave has been docked in Solitude for well over a month, and with no sign of shipping out any time soon.
String.Dest: 很显然，赤红波浪已经在独孤城停泊一个多月了，依然没有离港的迹象。

String.Source: Speaking of which, what about family? Do you have any brothers or sisters?
String.Dest: 说到这儿，你的家庭是怎么样的呢？你有兄弟或姐妹吗？

String.Source: If you change your mind, you know where to find me.
String.Dest: 如果你改变主意了，你知道在哪里可以找到我。

String.Source: Homesick, my love? Can't say I know that feeling. I've been doing everything I can to stay away, given the whole inheritance thing.
String.Dest: 思乡了，我亲爱的？虽不能说我感同身受。考虑到继承遗产的关系，我已尽力不沉迷其中。

String.Source: This war has taken a toll on the merchants of Skyrim. Let's hope that it ends soon, for their sake.
String.Dest: 这场战争给天际的商人带来了相当大的损失，让我们为他们祈祷，希望这场战争赶紧结束吧。

String.Source: Before that I was with Adrianne Avenicci in Whiterun. And before that, Beirand in Solitude.
String.Dest: 在此之前我曾与战争少女于白漫城共识。在白漫城之前, 我在独孤城的铁匠铺。

String.Source: You're brave to ask a woman out you barely even know. That's a fine quality for any adventurer.
String.Dest: 你很勇敢，竟然想跟一个你压根儿不认识的妹子约会。这对每个冒险者来说，都是优秀的品质。

String.Source: Sounds like another Ulfric. But if the Stormcloaks were trying to claim the throne by Divine right, I would be less inclined to hate them.
String.Dest: 听起来像翻版的乌佛瑞克。但是如果风暴斗篷要以圣灵的名义要求王位，我就不会这么讨厌他们了。

String.Source: That's incredible, my love! Although to be honest, you'll have to remind me who Movarth Piquine is. I don't read much.
String.Dest: 真是不可思议，达令！但是老实说，你应该给我说莫瓦斯·皮其恩是谁。我没有看太多。

String.Source: Still need me to do something?
Aye. If you feel this cause is worthy, love, then I trust you. Besides, what smith wouldn't want to forge a legendary axe?
String.Dest: 当然。如果你觉得这是值得的，亲爱的，那我就相信你。而且，什么样的铁匠才不想去打造一把传奇斧子啊？

String.Source: You're out of your league!
Take care.
I might not be home for lunch next week. Some of the folks in town invited me to the tavern for a drink. But maybe I'll find an excuse by then.
String.Dest: 我下星期可能不会回家吃午饭了。镇上的一些人邀请我去酒馆喝一杯。但也许到那时候我会找个借口。

String.Source: And this is my home as well. But I don't mean Skyrim. Whatever land or earth is under your feet, that's where I belong.
String.Dest: 这是我的家。不过我不是指天际。在你脚下任何土地或者大地那是属于我的地方。

String.Source: I don't know what you're talking about.
I just want to sort of apologize in advance for my cooking. I know I'm not that great in the kitchen. Not many blacksmiths are.
String.Dest: 我想提前对我的烹饪表示抱歉，我知道我不是一个好厨师，大多数铁匠都不是。

String.Source: Which makes three out of three. I am officially swooning.
String.Dest: 这三样都这么不错！我正沉醉在狂喜之中。

String.Source: A dragon, and from what you've told me, not just any dragon. This one is second only to the World Eater.
String.Dest: 一条龙，而且根据你告诉我的情况，这可不是一般的龙。这是仅次于世界吞噬者的家伙。

String.Source: Fine.
Let's get going.
Oh, I've heard about those. A friend of mine back in Kvatch was a pretty avid reader, and he'd tell me stories about Decumus Scotti's adventures.
String.Dest: 哦，我听说过这些。我的一个在科瓦奇城的朋友是个热心读者，他跟我讲了这个关于德西默斯·斯科蒂的冒险故事。

String.Source: Do you mean like witchcraft? I'm a smith, not a hagraven.
String.Dest: 你的意思是像巫术吗？我是个铁匠，不是乌鸦鬼婆。

String.Source: Come on in. Just stoked the fire. Take a seat and get the cold out.
String.Dest: 快请进。到火炉边坐吧，驱散身上的寒气。

String.Source: I'm on it.
I hope we bump into each other again.
String.Dest: 希望我们有机会再见面。

String.Source: Die, damn you!
And we're known to be pretty stubborn when it comes to one of our own.
String.Dest: 当类似的事牵涉到自身时，我们则会以异常的固执而闻名。

String.Source: You want to do this now? I suppose I could. All I really need is the blood.
String.Dest: 你想现在就做吗？我想我可以。我真正需要的就是鲜血。

String.Source: Let me know if you see anything you like.
String.Dest: 如果你看上了什么就请告诉我。

String.Source: I admit, I had a fantasy or two about the Hero of Kvatch. And part of me used to dream of being the wife of a great hero.
String.Dest: 我承认，我有过一两个有关科瓦奇城英雄的幻想。其中一部分是我曾经梦想成为一名伟大英雄的妻子。

String.Source: Old stonework. Gold, traps, and bones.
String.Dest: 古老石雕制品，金币、陷阱和骨头。

String.Source: Can't sleep well no matter how much drink I put in me.
String.Dest: 不管我灌自己多少酒，我还是睡不好觉。

String.Source: With this shield, I will stand beside you and deflect every arrow, parry every blow. In this shield I have placed my prayers for your safe return.
String.Dest: 有了这个盾牌, 我会站在你身边，挡住每一个射来的箭头，做好每一次格挡。我会祝福你平安归来。

String.Source: To hear her tell it, we would've taken Kvatch back, if not for the Concordant. And her blades would've killed a whole lot of Thalmor.
String.Dest: 要不是因为议会，我们不会在听科瓦奇说出来之前就把她带回去，那样她的剑还会杀更多的梭默。

String.Source: Which reminds me, I've never asked you about your family, have I?
String.Dest: 这倒是提醒我了，我从没问过你的家事呢，是吧？

String.Source: Wait!
Your only goal should be to kill him and survive. Of course, I'll be with you as always.
String.Dest: 你的唯一目标应该是杀掉他并且活下来。当然，我会一直在你身边。

String.Source: All right, then.
Get him!
That was delicious.
Farewell, my love.
There was this girl who really liked my brother, Larias, and he fancied her as well. But she was nervous about having to kiss him.
String.Dest: 这女孩爱我兄弟拉瑞亚斯爱得深沉，而我兄弟也挺心仪她。不过她在要跟他亲嘴这事儿上还有点“羞射”。

String.Source: Ugh...
It's always been my dream to smith weapons and armor for a real hero. And if the rumors are true, well...I just hope I'm not blushing.
String.Dest: 我一直梦想能用我的作品武装一位真正的英雄。不过要是传言不虚，呃……希望我的脸现在没那么红。

String.Source: Why, were you worried I'd stand you up? Not likely. The locals call me the town greeter. I never pass on a chance to talk to a fresh face.
String.Dest: 为什么，被你担心我会站在你这边？不太可能。当地人叫我小镇迎宾员。我从来没有把约会的机会，给过一个新面孔。

String.Source: You scared me! I thought you were going to say you killed a Jarl or something.
String.Dest: 你吓死我了！我还以为你会说你杀了一个领主什么的。

String.Source: If I had to take a guess, I'd say you fit the classic hero mold. The humility doesn't hurt either.
String.Dest: 如果要我猜的话，我会说你就是一块做英雄的料。谦虚点也没什么影响。

String.Source: One of them dropped your name a couple times, to point out the urgency of his quest. Maybe he was trying to impress me as well.
String.Dest: 他们中的一个提到了你的名字几次，来指出他任务的紧迫，还是说他是想打动我。

String.Source: As you command, my Thane.
It shall be done.
So what I suppose I'm saying is, I couldn't craft you a weapon without telling you how I feel.
String.Dest: 所以我想，我要说的是，我根本不能在告诉你的我感受之前，就为你打造一把武器。

String.Source: Do you agree to be bound together, in love, now and forever?
String.Dest: 你们愿意结为一体，永远相爱吗？

String.Source: Wherever the Daedra hide, the Vigil of Stendarr will cast them into the light.
String.Dest: 无论魔族躲藏在何处，我们都会把它们揪出来。

String.Source: Don't know. One of them was a charming Nord, but not the sharing type. The other one, he was the opposite.
String.Dest: 不知道。其中一个是位英俊的诺德人，但他不是会那种懂得分享的类型。而另一个人则恰恰相反。

String.Source: Ah, that makes sense, my love. And you've always been a bit rough around the edges. Which is a good thing.
String.Dest: 啊，那可以理解，吾爱。你总是比可接受程度之上还要狂野一点。这是好事。

String.Source: Maybe.
For honor!
Hmph.
Ahrk fin norok paal graan fod nust hon zindro zaan, Dovahkiin, fah hin kogaan mu draal!
String.Dest: 阿克 芬 诺罗 帕尔 古兰 佛 努斯 洪 金德罗 赞，都瓦克因，法 辛 克甘 姆 德阿尔

String.Source: I believe we're done.
That makes for an uneven quench. Of course, if your well is big enough, it'll make sure the liquid stays in contact regardless.
String.Dest: 虽然这并不能解燃眉之急，但如果你的泉眼足够大，不论如何它至少能保证水流不间断。

String.Source: So when they say, "No hero goes it alone," it won't be some empty phrase.
String.Dest: 因而，如若他们说“英雄从不独自前行”一样，我相信这句话的真理。

String.Source: As you can imagine, it's a city that reveres its heroes. None more so than the Hero of Kvatch, whose statue stands in the castle courtyard.
String.Dest: 你可以想象，那是个崇拜英雄的城市。没什么比得上科瓦奇城的英雄了，他的雕像就屹立在城堡的庭院里。

String.Source: I've always been fascinated by heroes and brave, capable warriors. It came from listening to my parents tell me tales of the Hero of Kvatch.
String.Dest: 我一直很迷恋英雄和强大的勇士，自我小时候听父母讲科瓦奇群英的传说我就开始了。

String.Source: That's how I was hooked into the blacksmith trade. I wanted to be the next hero's shield. I wanted to be their armor, and their sword.
String.Dest: 那就是我为何迷恋于铁匠生意。我想成为下一个英雄的盾，我想成为他们的护甲和利刃。

String.Source: But it's more than that. I want to forge weapons that reflect my passion for the cause. I want warriors to look at my steel and feel inspired.
String.Dest: 但是还不止这些。我想锻造出能映射为此付出的我的热情的武器，我想要战士们看着我的钢铁感到鼓舞和振奋。

String.Source: Welcome home, my love. Let us enjoy this new world together.
String.Dest: 欢迎回家，我的爱人！一起来享受新生活吧。

String.Source: You mean Elisif? Wouldn't that be a whole lot of egg on Ulfric's face, to win the war and still lose the crown. But I suppose anything's possible.
String.Dest: 你是指艾莉西弗？那乌佛瑞克不是搬起石头砸了自己的脚吗？赢得了战争却还是没得到王位。不过我还是觉得一切皆有可能。

String.Source: I'll be waiting.
I'll kill you if I have to!
You will bleed!
Which one? I forged almost a dozen axes, bows, and armor for all those people you saved at Angarvunde.
String.Dest: 哪一个？我给那些你从安枷坟救出来的人打造了成堆的斧头弓箭盔甲什么的。

String.Source: Aye love, it does seem odd the Nord would just disappear. Maybe you can follow some of your other leads, and find out what happened.
String.Dest: 是的亲爱的，那诺德人的突然消失确实非常奇怪。或许你可以跟随其他线索一起去找找看到底发生了什么。

String.Source: I like your confidence, but you have to remember who you're talking to. I'm from Kvatch.
String.Dest: 我喜欢你的自信，但是别忘了你在和谁说话。我来自科瓦奇城。

String.Source: That's what I thought.
Aye, you would be a fool's fool to ignore the Dragonborn, or worse yet, make an enemy of him. I'm sure you'll hear from them soon enough.
String.Dest: 噢，你一定是个白痴才愚蠢到想要忽视龙裔，要是更作死的话就是与他为敌。我确定你很快就会从他们那里听到这个的。

String.Source: I couldn't agree more. By the way, have you heard any interesting rumors lately?
String.Dest: 不能同意你更多了。顺便一提，你最近听过什么有趣的传言吗？

String.Source: I told you when we got married that I was your sword and your shield. I'm also a shoulder, and I can carry your burdens. What troubles you, my love?
String.Dest: 我们结婚的时候我就跟你说过了。我是你的利剑，你的坚盾。也是一双你可以依靠的肩膀，为你排忧解难。什么事儿让你烦心呢？亲爱的？？

String.Source: Or you could be lying, but I prefer to imagine adventurers as humble, rather than sneaky.
String.Dest: 不然你就是在说谎，我更愿意把探险者想成是谦卑的姿态，而不是鬼鬼祟祟的怂包。

String.Source: Speaking of which, if you come across the book "Uncommon Taste" in your travels, make sure to bring it home. I could use the advice.
String.Dest: 话说你旅行的时候如果找到那本"不同寻常的美味" , 请千万把它带回来。我可以借鉴学习一下.

String.Source: Talk to the priest in Riften. We can marry at the Temple of Mara.
String.Dest: 跟裂谷城的祭司谈谈。我们可以在玛拉神庙里结婚。

String.Source: It is from her love of us that we first learned to love one another. It is from this love that we learn that a life lived alone is no life at all.
String.Dest: 从她的关爱中，我们第一次懂得去爱，从她的关爱中，我们懂得孤独的人生是不完整的。

String.Source: Really, my love? Granted, I didn't get out much either. After long nights working the forge, I was too tired to leave the house.
String.Dest: 真的吗，亲爱的？就算如此，我出门的次数也不多。每晚在锻炉的工作让我太疲劳了，以至于我没有力气走出家门。

String.Source: Sure. I guess I sometimes forget how many of you like to work in groups.
String.Dest: 是啊。我好像老是忘记你们大多数都喜欢扎堆工作。

String.Source: Indeed.
True, but if an arrow pierces the heart, you won't have a body left to heal. But I guess that's why a lot of light armor only protects certain areas.
String.Dest: 正解，但如果被一箭穿心的话，你就没有一具奄奄一息的身体能留下等着痊愈了。不过我猜这就是很多轻甲只护住某些特定位置的原因。

String.Source: After all, Eorlund works the Skyforge. How is any smith going to compete with that?
String.Dest: 厄伦德为天空熔炉工作。这点有哪个铁匠能比得上呢？
