String.Source: Alright. This was...interesting. You're a lot different from what I expected. But it was nice talking to you.
String.Dest: 好吧。这挺……有趣的。你跟我期望的有很大不同。但很高兴跟你聊天。

String.Source: When it comes time for me to inherit the forge, there's a ritual. A test, actually.
String.Dest: 当时候到了我要继承熔炉的时候，会有一个仪式，准确来说，是一个考验。

String.Source: I'll tear you to pieces!
But anyhow, do you have family back in Valenwood? Any brothers or sisters?
String.Dest: 不过不管怎样， 你在威木省有家人吗？ 有兄弟姐妹吗?

String.Source: You better have coin to pay for your drinks. There's no handouts here.
String.Dest: 你最好付得起酒钱。这里可没有在布施的。

String.Source: I know just what you mean. Heard anything interesting lately? Any news or gossip?
String.Dest: 我懂了。最近有什么有意思的吗？新闻或者八卦都行？

String.Source: Get ready for a fight.
Really? That's not what I expected. But it must get rather lonely out there on the road.
String.Dest: 真的？这可不是我所期望的。但它在外面路上肯定觉得很孤独了。

String.Source: We'll handle things from here. Move along.
String.Dest: 现在由我们接手处理，请离开吧。

String.Source: Leave me.
That's why only those who share her blood can use the forge, and tradition that the firstborn daughter would be the one to inherit it.
String.Dest: 这就是为什么只有跟她流淌着同样血液的人才能使用这个熔炉的原因了， 传统来说，长女正是那个要继承它的人。

String.Source: Stendarr's Mercy be upon you, for the Vigil has none to spare.
String.Dest: 愿斯丹达尔怜悯你吧，守夜人是绝不姑息一切罪恶的。

String.Source: Bye.
He let me work the forge when it was free. At first he never said a word, but pretty soon he couldn't help but dole out advice.
String.Dest: 他让我在锻炉空闲的时候操作它，一开始他啥话也不说，但很快他就忍不住要指点一二了。

String.Source: I nicked my finger the other day cutting fruit. But the things are so calloused, it's like trying to draw blood from a stone.
String.Dest: 几天前，我切水果割到手指头了。但是事情跟预想的不太一样，刀子割到我的手上就像是那把刀想要给一块石头放血一样。

String.Source: What is it you want?
(Laughs) Yeah, Adrianne said as much. She pointed up to that great eagle and said "Child, if this is the Skyforge, what in Oblivion is that thing?"
String.Dest: (笑声) 是啊，就像女铁匠说的那样。她指向雄鹰，说：“孩子，如果这是天空熔炉，在湮灭领域中又是什么呢？”"

String.Source: As you wish.
Have you visited Rorikstead lately? No matter how harsh the winter, the crops that grow there never falter.
String.Dest: 你最近去过洛里斯泰德吗？不管那里的冬天有多严苛，庄稼都会长得很好。

String.Source: I forget how hot the forge is back home. The metal there's a lot easier to shape. But with Beirand's help, I learned to smith the Nord way.
String.Dest: 我回家的时候，都忘了熔炉到底有多滚烫。也忘了那里的金属会更容易成型。但在贝尔兰德的帮助下，我开始学会了用诺德人的方式打铁。

String.Source: Probably.
But I had fun speaking with you. Thank you, and good night.
String.Dest: 但是和你说话很有意思。谢谢你，晚安。

String.Source: I'm sorry, my hearing must have gone bad. For a second I thought you said you joined the Dark Brotherhood.
String.Dest: 抱歉我耳朵一定是有毛病。刚才我以为你说你要加入暗黑兄弟会。

String.Source: Not possible.
With the soldiers all fighting in the war, there's nobody to hunt down the bandits. Travel has become dangerous of late.
String.Dest: 士兵都去参战了，没人去打土匪，这使得出行变得更危险了。

String.Source: Well, I got my start in Solitude. I wanted to forge arms for all the brave Legionnaires fighting in Skyrim.
String.Dest: 好吧，我从独孤城开始我的铁匠生活. 我希望我能替在天际省的勇敢的军团战士铸造武器.

String.Source: I...I don't know what to say. Am I blushing? I feel like I'm blushing.
String.Dest: 我……我不知道该说些什么。我脸红了吗?我觉得我的脸好烫。

String.Source: I have no complaints.
Be seeing you.
Alright. Already forgotten.
Greetings, Arch-Mage.
I met a couple of Redguard from Hammerfell once. I couldn't help but ask them about their swords.
String.Dest: 曾经我遇到过一对来自落锤省的红卫人 ，我忍不住问了关于他们的剑的问题。

String.Source: That's wonderful news! My mother told me stories of how the Blades guided Martin Septim toward his destiny as Emperor.
String.Dest: 那真是个好消息！我母亲跟讲过刀锋战士如何引导马丁·塞普丁迈向成为一个君王的命运。

String.Source: You won't leave here alive!
So I told him, you know the Dragonborn? Well I'm bloody married to him!
String.Dest: 然后我就告诉他，你知道龙裔吗? 我他妈嫁给了他！

String.Source: Never fashioned a curved sword before. I love our home, but maybe we ought to head over to Hammerfell someday for a season.
String.Dest: 之前我从未见过弧形剑。我热爱我的家园，但是未来某个时间我也许会去落锤省。

String.Source: Mercy!
String.Dest: 饶命啊！我祈求你的怜悯

String.Source: She's always been the more creative smith. Diamond encrusted pommels, hilts that shimmered like drake scales...everything she made was beautiful.
String.Dest: 她一直是最富创造性的铁匠。钻石镶嵌在剑柄上，如龙鳞般闪着淡淡的光芒…她的作品总是那么美丽。

String.Source: Was it something I said?
What about you, do you have family back home?
It's as if every dream I had as a child wasn't just some idle fantasy....but part of some larger prophecy. My...I think I need to sit down.
String.Dest: 就好像我还是个孩子时拥有的每一个梦都不是些漫无边际的幻想……而是某种大型预言的一部分。我了个……我想我得坐一会儿。

String.Source: And the braggart did swagger and brandish his blade, as he told of bold battles and gold he had made!
String.Dest: 大话精吹嘘他身经百战，炫耀着金币还有他的剑。

String.Source: You win! I submit!
Olette, have you been hunting skeevers in the tunnels again?
String.Dest: 欧雷特，你又在隧道里虐杀雪鼠了吗？

String.Source: No, but really, I have a good feeling about you. You can do a lot of good around here.
String.Dest: 不，但是真的，我对你的感觉不赖。你能给这片地方做很多好事。

String.Source: Die, vampire!
(Laughs) A lot of people come around here saying the same. But you're the first one I believe.
String.Dest: (笑声) 很多来这附近的人都这么说。但是你是第一个我相信的人。

String.Source: She thought she wouldn't be any good at it. So, helpful person that I was, I decided to let her practice on me.
String.Dest: 她认为没有谁能比她更深谙于此。于是，本着乐于助人的原则，我决定让她在我身上练习。

String.Source: What? The dragon you met at High Hrothgar? Why would they ask you to do that?
String.Dest: 啥？你去高吼峰见了一条龙？他们为什么要让你去做这种事啊？

String.Source: Legend has it that then when the Daedra invaded, she refused to leave her shop, smithing weapons for the townsfolk until the last man had fallen.
String.Dest: 传说当魔族入侵之时，她拒绝离开她的铺子，直到最后一个人的鲜血将这里染红为止，她一直在为民兵们打造兵器。

String.Source: I'll see you in pieces!
Still, strange that we never met. Does your family still live there? Do you have any brothers or sisters?
String.Dest: 啊，又是没见过的陌生人。您家人可好？有兄弟姐妹吗？

String.Source: I guess all that's left now is to forge this axe. Have you gotten word from your friends?
String.Dest: 我猜现在剩下的事儿就只有造把斧头了。你从你朋友那边得到信儿了吗？

String.Source: When a guard comes to me and tells me my armor stopped an arrow inches from his heart, or that my mace split a troll skull with a single bludgeon...
String.Dest: 当一个守卫过来说跟我说，我做的盔甲将一支利箭挡在了离他心脏只有几英尺的地方时，又或者我锻造的狼牙棒仅仅一击就让一个食人魔的脑袋开了花时……

String.Source: I've had enough of you!
Too slow!
That it?
Agreed.
You know I can't get enough of your adventures, my love. What is it this time?
String.Dest: 亲爱的，你知道我一直是你那冒险故事的忠实粉丝。那么这次怎么了？

String.Source: I can take care of myself.
Hello.
Nah. I don't think so.
Finally.
Let me know if there's anything else you need.
String.Dest: 如果你还有什么需要的话，告诉我。

String.Source: (Laughter)
I trust you won't be disappointed.
Shor have mercy on you!
Brilliant. I'll meet you there.
Still, there's a lot of High Elves that are against the Aldmeri Dominion. I'm sure you don't approve of them either, my love.
String.Dest: 不过，也有很多高等精灵是反对先祖神州的。你肯定也不会赞同他们吧，亲爱的。

String.Source: Which is probably untrue. I'm sure the Hero traveled with many a friend, and relied on many more. That's all part of the adventurers journey.
String.Dest: 那可不一定。那位英雄肯定有许多朋友一路同行，出门靠朋友嘛。所有的冒险者日记都这么写的。

String.Source: Safe travels.
Outlanders should mind their own business.
String.Dest: 外来者们应该先管好自己的事。

String.Source: I wouldn't know what to do with it, but it'd be nice to have around the house as a conversation piece.
String.Dest: 我也不打算知道他们做什么，不过要是在这房子附近聊聊天的话还是不错的。

String.Source: Oh, um...right. Forgive me, I need some time alone.
String.Dest: 噢，呃……对。抱歉啊，我得一个人静一静。

String.Source: But at the same time, I don't know about forging weapons for anyone but the Empire.
String.Dest: 与此同时，我也不知道除了帝国我还能帮谁打造兵器。

String.Source: I know, but I don't want to be some footnote in the hero's tale. I want the things I forge to be personal.
String.Dest: 我懂，可我只是不想做别人英雄事迹的脚注而已。我想要的是自己的成就。

String.Source: I guess I never really loved anyone other than you. Even my first kiss was devoid of all romance.
String.Dest: 我想我从来没有真正爱过除你之外的任何人。即使是我的初吻也没有一丝浪漫。

String.Source: I am at your service.
Wonderful. I'll see you there.
It would've been a great help too, if my brother didn't catch us during one of our practice sessions. I think he's still dealing with the scars.
String.Dest: 如果我哥哥没有在我们的那次练习中抓住我们的话，它本应该也能起到很大的帮助的。我想他至今还在处理那次的伤痕。

String.Source: Goodbye, my love.
Alright. Now it's my turn. So, what's it like being an adventurer? It must be exciting to wander Skyrim, never knowing what tomorrow will bring.
String.Dest: 好吧。现在轮到我了。那么，作一个冒险者是什么感觉？徜徉整个天际省一定是令人激动的，永远不知道明天会发生什么。

String.Source: Sure, why not.
Aye, he must think the legends and the names will be enough. Ysgramor's, and maybe even yours. I can't say I disagree.
String.Dest: 哎，他一定认为那些传说和名字就已经足够了。伊斯格拉谟的，甚至可能是你的。我不能说我不同意。

String.Source: Still, the treaty did gave us our home back. And if there's one thing the people of Kvatch know, it's how to rebuild.
String.Dest: 不过，那条约也确实把我们的家还给了我们。并且如果有一件事科瓦奇的人都知道，那就是它是如何重建的。

String.Source: But that's not something I want to think about. At least not now. Do you have family back in Elsweyr? Any brothers or sisters?
String.Dest: 但是那不是我想要考虑的事情。至少现在不是。你在艾斯维尔有家人吗？有什么兄弟姐妹吗？

String.Source: Great.
You should try that bit on the barkeep. Maybe get yourself a free drink.
String.Dest: 你应该去酒吧老板那里去试试，也许能弄到一杯免费的饮料。

String.Source: You know, you're a fun person to drink with. I know this great little place where the wine flows like water. We should head there.
String.Dest: 你知道吗，你是个有趣的酒友。我知道个很好的小地方，那里酒流成河。我们应该去那里。

String.Source: More importantly, you're my wife, and the only person I've ever wanted.
String.Dest: 更重要的是，你是我的爱人，我生命之中的唯一。

String.Source: Of course I'm here, love. You make it sound like I would've missed a party for my own spouse! Or is there something else troubling you?
String.Dest: 亲爱的，我在呢，一直都在。你这样让我觉得，好像刚刚错过一场只为你而开的盛会！还是，有别的事情让你烦心？

String.Source: Someday, I want to forge something that represents more than honor. Something that speaks to my inner devotion, and a true love.
String.Dest: 总有一天，我要锻造一个东西，它不仅仅代表荣誉。更代表着我心底赤诚、真挚的爱恋。

String.Source: Take a look.
What do you want?
(Laughs) I wouldn't go that far. I've met some pretty smart mudcrabs. But none were as sharp as you.
String.Dest: (笑声) 我才不会走那么远呢。我遇到过许多小泥沼蟹。但是没哪一个像你这样狡猾的。

String.Source: Aye, and I'm sure those cities aren't running around the countryside like a headless chicken. That would just make you dizzy.
String.Dest: 唉，不过我可以肯定的是，那些村落不会像无头苍蝇一样在郊外乱晃。这可能让你有点晕菜了吧。

String.Source: Greetings.
That's enough!
Sounds like a coward to me. I don't know why your friends don't try to be more like you. A champion never retreats when times are tough.
String.Dest: 听起来是个懦夫啊。我真不明白你的朋友怎么不多跟你学学。勇敢者面对困境从不退缩才对。

String.Source: A letter... not sure who from. He wouldn't say. Just that he was a friend of yours.
String.Dest: 一封信……不知道是谁寄来的。他似乎有意隐瞒。只是自称是你的一个朋友。

String.Source: I could take her.
Die, beast!
Now I work for Lod, but someday I'll have to return to Cyrodiil, and work for myself. You see, someone has to inherit the family forge.
String.Dest: 现在我是为罗德打工，可是总有一天我得回到赛瑞迪尔, 自己做老板。要知道，有的人不得不继承家族的熔炉啊。

String.Source: Are those parts ready yet?
Of course they have, my love. All the good you did for Falkreath, I knew you were no ordinary adventurer. They're lucky to have you.
String.Dest: 他们应当如此，亲爱的。你为佛克瑞斯做出了如此大的贡献，我就知道你不是普通的冒险者。能有你在一旁助力可真是他们的荣幸啊。

String.Source: For blood! For glory!
But I'm not a blacksmith yet. Just Isobel the Apprentice. I've come to Skyrim as part of pilgrimage, to learn how the Nords smith such fine blades.
String.Dest: 但我现在还不算是铁匠。只是一个名叫伊莎贝尔的学徒罢了。我跟着那些朝圣者的队伍来到了天际省，来学习诺德人那能锻造出如此精良的武器的技巧。

String.Source: Okay, I'll go now.
And you must have a calendar that charts the movements. Given how everything changes, it's a good thing Bosmer don't grow vegetables.
String.Dest: 你应该有一个日程表吧，用来记录每一步的那种。时过境迁，木精灵终于不再种蔬菜了这是件好事呢。

String.Source: Fight! Fight!
I'm just an apprentice, and a wayward traveler like yourself. I'm actually on a pilgrimage to train under the great blacksmiths of Skyrim.
String.Dest: 我只是个学徒，只是个像你一样四处漂泊的旅人。实际上，我是慕天际省那精湛的锻造技艺而来，希望能得到提点的。

String.Source: Are you saying what I think you're saying? You know what happened to Indara's daughter, right? (Sigh) I'll go get the broom.
String.Dest: 我们是在说同一件事吗？你知道在因达拉的女儿身上发生的事对吗？（叹息）我去拿扫帚了。

String.Source: Part of me wonders now if mother agreed to this pilgrimage knowing that I would never come back.
String.Dest: 其实我现在也有点好奇，当初若是我的母亲知道我会一去不复返的话，她还会不会同意我踏上这朝圣之旅呢。

String.Source: Take that!
Vampires?
Not this again.
What about family? Do you have any brothers or sisters? They weren't at the wedding.
String.Dest: 那么家庭呢？你还有兄弟或者姐妹吗？婚礼的时候他们可没来啊。

String.Source: Since the day you came to Lod's shop in Falkreath, I've loved you. Although I guess now that you saved it, the whole world feels the same.
String.Dest: 在你踏入佛克瑞斯的洛德商店的那一瞬间，我就爱上了你。不过我猜你现在已经拯救完了世界了……对吗，一切又恢复往常了呢。

String.Source: I came here to help the Empire and put an end to Ulfric's reckless ambition. But now, I think the whole thing is childish and stupid.
String.Dest: 我来这里是为了帮助帝国终结乌佛瑞克胆大妄为的野心。但现在，我觉得整件事都是幼稚而愚蠢的。

String.Source: Of course, my love. I knew this day would come, and I'd be lying if I said I wasn't scared.
String.Dest: 当然，亲爱的。我知道这一天终将到来的。如果我说不怕的话，那是撒谎。

String.Source: Truly, my love? Was it one of those moving cities I always hear about?
String.Dest: 真的吗，亲爱的？那个我一直听说过的动人的城市？

String.Source: Are you listening?
Of course I'll fashion a blade for you. After all you've done for this city, I'd be honored.
String.Dest: 我当然会为你造一把剑。毕竟你的所作所为都是为了这座城市，这是我的荣幸。

String.Source: I'd dive in, my love. Then I'd make sure to grab a handful for your dinner. You don't want to poke fun at the person who cooks your meals.
String.Dest: 我要开吃啦，亲爱的。我很确定在你的晚餐面前我的吃货本性会暴露无遗的。你不会想去作弄给你做饭的人的。

String.Source: Yes, my Thane?
Don't tell my parents that. Mention the word "Thalmor" and my father will get a case of the rattles. So will you, when he's strangling your neck.
String.Dest: 不要告诉我的父母。一提"梭默"这个词我老爹就会把你的脖子掐得咯咯作响。

String.Source: You seem tense. Join a booth and relax a bit. Or did you need another fix?
String.Dest: 你看起来很僵硬。选一个包厢，放轻松点吧。还是你还要再来点乐子？

String.Source: We're not supposed to talk to the guests.
String.Dest: 我们不能与客人们交谈

String.Source: Karras, what's the word on that contract? I've got a stock of weapons and armor ready to go.
String.Dest: 卡拉斯，契约上写了什么？ 我得准备去进一批武器和盔甲的货了。

String.Source: An adventurer and a blacksmith, huh. You and I are a lot alike. I'm actually on a pilgrimage of sorts.
String.Dest: 一个冒险家和铁匠，哼嗯。你和我很相似。我实际上勉强称得上是在进行朝圣之旅。

String.Source: When I imagine a soldier marching off to battle, or a hero vanquishing a great evil, that's when my hammer feels most inspired.
String.Dest: 当我想象一个士兵行军去战斗，亦或是一位英雄战胜了邪恶之后，都会让我的战锤感觉激昂万分。

String.Source: May the Hist guide us.
String.Dest: 愿希思特神树指引我们。

String.Source: You're back.
To explain that, I need to explain a bit about smithing. See, when you quench a blade, you can't just use water or brine.
String.Dest: 为了把它说清楚，我得向你说些锻造方面的事情。你看，当你在给一把刀淬火的时候，你不能只用水或者盐水。

String.Source: And it wouldn't matter that the blades couldn't cut warm butter. Nobody would ever use them for battle.
String.Dest: 就算那些刀刃钝的连热黄油都切不开也没关系。没人会舍得拿它们去作战。

String.Source: But I'm not a blacksmith yet. Just Isobel the Apprentice. I've come to Skyrim as part of pilgrimage, to learn how the Nords smith such fine blades.
String.Dest: 但我还不是一个铁匠。我只是学徒伊莎贝尔。天际省是我朝圣之旅的一部分，我想看看诺德人是如何打造出如此精良的武器的。

String.Source: By the Nine...
Is it true that the Khajiit warriors there don't wear any armor? It'd be a poor place for a blacksmith to make a living.
String.Dest: 听说虎人战士们不穿盔甲，是真的吗？那想必铁匠在那里会过得很辛苦。

String.Source: They're an honorable lot, and they have an impressive armory, if I recall correctly. I'd love to get my hands on some Akaviri craftsmanship.
String.Dest: 他们是一群可敬的人，要是我记的没错，他们有个让人印象深刻的兵器库。我真想去亲手摸摸那些阿卡维尔工匠的手艺。

String.Source: For Kodlak!
Is that all?
That's right. I was born there after the Great War. A lot of children were, once everyone knew we'd have peace.
String.Dest: 没错。浩大战争结束后我在那里出生。很多小孩都在那里出生，曾经所有人都认为和平会持续。

String.Source: Got it.
Well, there might be nothing to it, but I've heard that the feud between the Gray-Manes and the Battle-Borns in Whiterun has grown ugly.
String.Dest: 嗯……也许没什么消息吧，但我听说雪漫城里灰鬃和战狂两家的梁子是越结越深了。

String.Source: That's not what I want. I want to craft weapons for heroes. I want to forge weapons that will slay tyrants, and craft armor that repels dragonfire.
String.Dest: 这不是我想要的结果。我希望为英雄们铸造武器。我希望我铸造的武器能弑杀暴君，而我打造的铠甲能抵御龙火。

String.Source: I'm better with swords than soup, but this should be edible. I hope.
String.Dest: 我应该带把剑而不是带碗汤，但汤能用来填肚子。至少我希望它能。

String.Source: I'll have some mead.
Good.
He told me all sorts of tales about a child of destiny and an axe to slay a legendary beast. Of course, I ate up every word.
String.Dest: 他告诉我诸如一个小孩的命运和一把屠杀巨兽的斧头之类的故事。当然，我总是左耳进右耳出。

String.Source: That's the cost of staying alive, Elf. Don't be cheap when it comes to that.
String.Dest: 那就是求生的代价，精灵。到这时你可别贪便宜。

String.Source: That's what I enjoyed most. Meeting all the travelers who crossed the border from Cyrodiil, and sharing stories of home.
String.Dest: 那就是我最享受的东西。遇见从赛瑞迪尔穿过边境来这里的旅行者，和他们分享家乡的事。

String.Source: Well, pretty much any pairing will work that doesn't involve Skjarn.
String.Dest: 唉，几乎每对没有夏尔捣乱的组合都很有成效。

String.Source: Lead us to our next task.
String.Dest: 带我们去下一个目的地。

String.Source: You think you can take me?
That the best you can do?
Ohhh... that's good stuff. Believe me friend, I've tried it all and this is the best.
String.Dest: 喔……这是好东西。相信我，朋友。我全都尝试过了，我知道这是最好的。

String.Source: Somehow I find that hard to believe. But modesty...that's something I wouldn't put past you.
String.Dest: 不知怎么我发现很难相信。但是退一步讲……有的事情我是不以为然的。

String.Source: Speak.
We have our wedding soon, don't we? That's right, we do!
String.Dest: 我们快结婚了，不是吗？就快了！

String.Source: Very much so, and thank you for asking.
String.Dest: 正是如此，谢谢你的邀请。

String.Source: See you around, my beauty.
Some say the weather in Skyrim is cold, but a long night working the forge is enough to warm any man's bones.
String.Dest: 有人说天际从来天寒地冻，但是在锻炉旁边叮叮当当一整晚，谁都会从里到外暖和起来的。

String.Source: So vanquish him, my love. Shout him down from the heavens, and make him rue the day he returned to the realm of the living.
String.Dest: 打败他，我的爱人。用你的怒吼把他从高天震落，让他后悔降临在凡间。

String.Source: But anyhow, do you have family back in Black Marsh? Any brothers or sisters?
String.Dest: 总之你在黑沼泽省有亲人吗？有没有兄弟姐妹？

String.Source: Are you serious? That was uncalled for. This conversation's over.
String.Dest: 你没在开玩笑吧？这根本没道理。好了，不谈了。

String.Source: I hope there aren't any more.
I'd forge your weapons and armor, and they would keep you company on the lonely road.
String.Dest: 我可以锻造你的武器和盔甲，这样它们就能在你那孤独的旅途中守护着你了。

String.Source: I'm your wife. How is it not? You should know by now that I'm not all that fond of the mysterious type.
String.Dest: 我是你的妻子。为什么不用我操心？到现在你也应该知道，我不是那种对未知事物完全沉迷的类型啊。

String.Source: Yes, I agree with you. Have you heard any news from the other parts of Skyrim?
String.Dest: 对，我同意。你有什么天际那边的消息吗？

String.Source: I suppose so, yes.
Very well.
I'm afraid I don't have any of the latter, nor can I even forge a blade using two separate metals. I'm a smith, not an alchemist.
String.Dest: 恐怕我这里没有后面这种材料，我甚至根本不可能把两种金属混合在一起来造一把剑。我是个铁匠，亲爱的，不是炼金术师。

String.Source: Hm...oh, sorry love, just lost in thought. Can't seem to remember where I put my hammer. I just got an idea for a new dagger.
String.Dest: 嗯……哦，抱歉亲爱的，我只是在思考问题。我记不起我把我的锤子放在哪儿了。我突然有了打造一把新匕首的灵感。

String.Source: You're a long way from home, my love. In more ways then one. You won't find any deserts in this part of Tamriel.
String.Dest: 要回到故乡你还有好长一段路要走，亲爱的。比你以往走过的路都要长。你在泰姆瑞尔大陆的这块区域里是找不到任何沙漠的。

String.Source: (Laughs) That's a good joke. And I know it's a joke, because I didn't marry the sort of person who frequents brothels.
String.Dest: (笑声) 真是个不错的笑话。我也知道这只个笑话，因为我才不会与那种妓院的常客结婚呢。

String.Source: Although there's been talk of another. A child descended from Ysgramor himself. I wonder how you could even prove that.
String.Dest: 不过还有另一个人选。一个继承了伊斯格拉谟血脉的孩子。我想知道你要怎样去证明。

String.Source: Gimme a mug of ale.
I've always felt the same. There's just some things you're more comfortable sharing with friends.
String.Dest: 我也有同样的感觉。某些东西只有当你和你的朋友分享时才会更美好。

String.Source: Is something the matter?
Speech!
Oh, I'm sorry. What happened to them?
String.Dest: 哦，我很抱歉。他们怎么啦？

String.Source: So you're a charmer. I should be careful around you. Now I'm not going to refuse a compliment, but you're wrong about the hands.
String.Dest: 你很吸引人，但呆在你身边我要小心。我不会拒绝任何称赞, 但是动手动脚就不对了。

String.Source: May they journey forth together in this life and the next, in prosperity and poverty, and in joy and hardship.
String.Dest: 愿他们无论贫穷还是富有，顺境还是逆境，都能相伴一生。

String.Source: Anything else?
We heading out?
No, that would be Lod. Big, burly fellow, but don't let that scare you. He's a friendly sort, and loyal as a dog.
String.Dest: 不，那人肯定不是罗德。他长得又高大又结实，但别被吓到。他是个很友善的人，和猎狗一样忠诚。

String.Source: And did you tell them that the Savior of Skyrim does not assassinate rulers? Tyrants, maybe, but I don't think Titus Mede the Second qualifies.
String.Dest: 那你有没有告诉他们天际的救世主没有暗杀皇帝？暴君，也许吧，但我认为提图斯迈德二世算不上一名暴君。

String.Source: But now you're here, and I can tell just by looking at your hands that you've got stories to tell.
String.Dest: 但现在你就在这里，而且我看看你的手就知道你有很多故事要讲。

String.Source: I'm right behind you.
They should recruit my mother. She's as good a builder as she is a swordsmith. She can make castles out of boards and nails.
String.Dest: 他们应该招募我妈妈。她是个出色的建筑师和铸剑师。她懂得如何用板材和钉子造出一座城堡。

String.Source: (Laughs) Considering everything you've done for me and the people, I suppose I can learn to share.
String.Dest: (笑声)考虑到你对我和人们所做的一切，我感觉应该可以试着去分享一下。

String.Source: It fills me with a warmth that no amount of coin can replicate.
String.Dest: 那种感觉……成就感……根本不是金币能够搞定的。

String.Source: Welcome home, my love.
It depends. I've been taught that emotions are a powerful part of smithing.
String.Dest: 那要看看了。我一直被教导说情感也是锻造的一个重要部分。

String.Source: Sometimes it pays to look in every nook and cranny.
String.Dest: 到处都仔细找找总是有收获的。

String.Source: Like my mother before me, and my grandmother before her, I must craft an object that best represents my ideals and spirit.
String.Dest: 就像我在我之前的母亲，以及在她之前的祖母一样，我必须要创造一个能最好的反映出我理想和精神的对象。

String.Source: That, and he's not my type. I prefer strong leaders, brave warriors, and a sense of humor wouldn't hurt. But Lod's a good man, loyal and kind.
String.Dest: 他不是我喜欢的类型。我更喜欢强大的领导人，勇敢的战士，充满无害的幽默感又。但罗德是个好人，忠诚而善良。

String.Source: Do you mean like witchcraft? You're talking nonsense, love, I didn't marry a heathen.
String.Dest: 你的意思是像巫术吗？你在说胡话，亲爱的，我可没有嫁给一个异教徒。

String.Source: Don't make me laugh!
What is it?
You're bloated with disease. The Vigilant of Stendarr can help you, as long as you promise to never assist the Daedra.
String.Dest: 你已经病入膏肓了。斯丹达尔的守备人们能帮助你，但你要承诺今后不可再与魔族相勾结。

String.Source: Now that I think on it, I did hear something rather interesting the other day.
String.Dest: 让我想想，我的确听到过更加有趣的事情。

String.Source: Without it, I can't make the oil. So I sent him off to talk to Cyrus with the East Empire Company, and see if he can't get it shipped sooner.
String.Dest: 没有它的话，我就不能上油了。所以我打发他去东帝国贸易公司和赛勒斯谈谈,看看他能不能更快的把它运到。

String.Source: Oh, did you need something?
So be it.
When I'm finished, I'll return to my home in Cyrodiil, and hopefully, apply what I've learned to the family business.
String.Dest: 当我完成的时候，我会回到我在赛瑞迪尔的家，也希望能把我学会的东西应用到家族生意上来。

String.Source: And now that I'm married, my sister will likely inherit the family legacy. But it turns out she's already been preparing to undergo the ritual.
String.Dest: 现在我结婚了，我的姐姐大概会继承家族的遗产。但事实上她已经准备接受仪式了。

String.Source: Walk always in the light, or we will drag you to it.
String.Dest: 你须行走于光明之下，否则我们必让你受光明的制裁。

String.Source: Now if you want me to quench the axe in blood, that I've done. In fact, you're the third person to ask me that this week.
String.Dest: 现在，如果你想要我用血淬炼这把斧子，那我已经做到了。事实上，你已经是这周第三个要我这么做的人了。

String.Source: I'm sorry to hear that. The way you described him, he seemed like a kind man...or a kind wolf, as it were.
String.Dest: 听到这个消息我很难过。按照你的说法，他应该是一个很好的人……或者说一个很好的狼人，就像以前一样。

String.Source: Of course.
I confess, my love, I don't know too much about the Breton kingdoms. I mean, they're not like the Forsworn, are they? Worshipping old magic?
String.Dest: 我承认，我的爱人，我对布莱顿人的王国知之甚少。我指，他们不会像弃逝者那样，对吧？崇拜那些古老的魔法？

String.Source: What do you mean?
It's a wonderful home, my love. The city already has a blacksmith, but maybe I can start a small store.
String.Dest: 这真是个完美的家，亲爱的。虽然这里已经有一家铁匠了，但或许我还可以再开一间小店。

String.Source: Let's move.
Okay.
Good luck.
Although, to be honest, I'm a little worried what it might say.
String.Dest: 尽管……说实话，我有点担心它会说些什么。

String.Source: There were several Khajiit camped outside the walls of Whiterun. Seems they've been traveling around the whole of Skyrim peddling their wares.
String.Dest: 有几个虎人在雪漫城外面扎营了。他们贩卖货物的足迹遍布整个天际。

String.Source: I remember when the other kids played hide and seek, we used it as a starting spot. But I just stayed there the whole time, marveling at it.
String.Dest: 我记得当其他小孩玩捉迷藏的时候，我们曾把这里当作起点。但我总是一直呆在这里，为它而惊叹。

String.Source: Alright.
So, what's the plan?
Everything is splendid, thank you.
Milord, the axe is ready, but it has to be now!
String.Dest: 老爷，斧头是准备好了，就是此时此刻！

String.Source: Point the way.
I wouldn't have missed it. It's my chance to honor the Dragonborn, a Hero of Riverwood, and the one who stopped Gren's rebellion.
String.Dest: 我不能错过。为了尊敬的龙裔，溪木镇的英雄，那个可以阻止格伦叛乱的人。

String.Source: You're as good as dead!
May your road lead you to warm sands.
String.Dest: 愿你的前路是温暖的沙地。

String.Source: This is ridiculous.
The truth is, I've always dreamed of someone like you coming into town, righting wrongs, helping the townsfolk.
String.Dest: 事实上，我一直梦想你这样的人到城里来，伸张正义，帮助市民。

String.Source: See you around, handsome.
Yes?
Or you could be lying, but I prefer to imagine my lady as humble, rather than sneaky.
String.Dest: 或者你在说谎， 我宁愿想象我的夫人是谦逊的也不愿把你想象成是鬼鬼祟祟的。

String.Source: Stop that!
I'm afraid I don't have any of the latter, nor can I even forge a blade using two separate metals. I'm a smith, love, not an alchemist.
String.Dest: 恐怕我这里没有后面这种材料，我甚至根本不可能把两种金属混合在一起来造一把剑。我是个铁匠，亲爱的，不是炼金术师。

String.Source: You're outmatched!
You've returned.
You speak truly. Have you heard any interesting rumors of late?
String.Dest: 如你所说，你最近听过什么有趣的传言吗？

String.Source: I've actually got everything I need, with the exception of one thing. I need a bit of Bloodgrass shipped from home. That's where the oil comes from.
String.Dest: 我已经得到了一切我需要的东西，除了一样儿。我还需要一些家乡运来的血草。那是个盛产油料的地方。

String.Source: Of course, my love. I wouldn't be a very good wife if I didn't. Or a good blacksmith, for that matter.
String.Dest: 当然了，亲爱的。如果我做不到，就不算是个好妻子，更别说是个好铁匠了。

String.Source: I trust your judgment, but I trust dragons about as far as I can throw them.
String.Dest: 我相信你的判断，但要想让我信任一条龙，除非我能把它抛起来。

String.Source: I'll teach you to talk to me that way!
String.Dest: 你居然敢这样跟我说话！

String.Source: In any event, it's been fun, but it's getting late. I'm going to get some sleep. Come by the shop in the morning if you need anything.
String.Dest: 不管如何,它真有趣,天色晚了，我要回家补个觉。想要什么明天再来店里找我。

String.Source: Thanks again for saving my life.
String.Dest: 再次谢谢你救了我一命。

String.Source: And only child? You did well not to grow up spoiled. Still, I'd be willing to bet you never had anything handed to you.
String.Dest: 只是小孩吗？ 看上去你还没有被宠坏。 但是我还是要跟你打赌你一无是处.

String.Source: That's right. I've got a bit of news.
String.Dest: 没错。我确实听到些风声。

String.Source: They say it was built atop a well of Daedric blood, and it's in that well that the weapons are cooled.
String.Dest: 有人说这把武器是在有着魔族之血的井上打造的, 这样的武器需要井里的血来冷却。

String.Source: It's not that I don't respect what the forge was, but I don't like what it's become.
String.Dest: 这并不是说我并不尊敬它锻造出的东西，但是我真的不喜欢这些东西将要成为的角色……也就是凶器。

String.Source: Right.
He'd say something like "Those dartwings you call arms can't shape steel. Put your hips into it."
String.Dest: 他会轻描淡写的说‘这些你称为装备的飞翼没法用钢打造。所以快滚吧。’

String.Source: Shall we get moving?
Certainly! It's a fine tune and a good request!
String.Dest: 当然！那是首不错的曲子，非常好的选择！

String.Source: Aye, you would be a fool's fool to ignore the Dragonborn, or worse yet, make an enemy of her. I'm sure you'll hear from them soon enough.
String.Dest: 同意。如果你忽视龙裔的存在，那你就是个蠢蛋。或者更糟的，你与她为敌。我想你已经听过很多他们的事情了。

String.Source: Die, dragon!
Thanks.
I'll tell you what I told the others. The forge in Kvatch is special, and it isn't just for blood.
String.Dest: 我对你和对其他人说的都一样。在科瓦奇锻造是非常特殊的一件事，那不仅仅需要鲜血。

String.Source: An Amulet of Mara. Someone like yourself deserves a wife who can repair your armor, and forge your weapons.
String.Dest: 你戴着玛拉的护符。像你这样的人也应该有一个妻子来为你修补铠甲，磨砺宝剑。

String.Source: That's probably why you're so well adjusted. It's always good to have siblings to share things with, and keep your ego in check.
String.Dest: 这可能就是你状态这么好的原因。有一些能够分享见闻的兄弟姐们一直都是好事，所以让你的自负控制在可以忍受的范围内。

String.Source: Mother hasn't taught me how to work the Star-Blood forge yet, but from what I understand, it's also extremely delicate.
String.Dest: 妈妈还没教我怎么星血熔炉, 但据我所知, 它非常的脆弱.

String.Source: Hey, be careful!
Tidings.
And maybe falling in love with the blacksmith's apprentice.
String.Dest: 并且可能爱上了铁匠的学徒……

String.Source: Alright, how about you meet me at the inn for a drink. I'll be finished here at around sundown.
String.Dest: 好吧，要不我们一会儿在酒馆见面一起喝酒聊天。我现在这干完活，大约黄昏就完事了。

String.Source: It'll convey all her feelings, desires, fears...and in the blade, he'll see her naked for the first time.
String.Dest: 、我会传达她所有的感情，欲望，恐惧。。。恕我直言，他会初次看见她的裸体.

String.Source: And if you really don't remember, your body will. I still have aches in my arms from forging all those weapons.
String.Dest: 就算你不记得了，你的身体也会记得。现在我的胳膊还因为锻造这些武器经常疼痛。

String.Source: (Sigh) Olette, we talked about this. You don't have to go hunting for your dinner anymore. I have a warm meal ready for you on the table.
String.Dest: (叹气) 欧雷特, 我们谈过这个了。你不用为晚餐去打猎了。我已经把热乎的食物放在桌子上了。

String.Source: Damn all this bureaucracy! The soldiers in the field need those weapons now!
String.Dest: 去你妈的官僚主义！ 这些战场上的士兵现在就需要武器！

String.Source: Agh!
Want to talk? Go ahead.
Stendarr be with you.
We gather here today, under Mara's loving gaze, to bear witness to the union of two souls in eternal companionship.
String.Dest: 我们齐聚于此，在玛拉慈爱的注视中，见证两个灵魂的结合。

String.Source: By Ysmir, you'll pay for that!
String.Dest: 伊斯米尔在上，你会为此付出代价的!

String.Source: We'll drive out the Empire from this land that we own. With our blood and our steel we will take back our home.
String.Dest: 驱逐帝国找回自我，用鲜血和盔甲重建家国。

String.Source: How can I help you?
I don't have to take this from the likes of you.
String.Dest: 我不是非得从你这种人手里拿到这个。

String.Source: Do come back.
Is that the best you can do?
Hear, hear!
I hope they'll serve the roast venison with bittergreen sauce that we had at the last party.
String.Dest: 我希望他们能提供烤鹿肉和苦菜酱，就像我们上次宴会吃的那种。

String.Source: I think we're done here.
What happened?
I'd hammer out any dent, sharpen every edge. So your weapons and our love, would be born anew.
String.Dest: 我都会敲平盔甲上的凹痕，磨利刀剑上的钝处。因此你的武器和我们的爱，都能得以重获新生。

String.Source: We drink to our youth, and to days come and gone. For the age of oppression is now nearly done.
String.Dest: 为了我们的青春，为了那些逝去的和将来的日子，我们干杯。

String.Source: This ends now!
All hail to Ulfric! You are the High King! In your great honor we drink and we sing.
String.Dest: 向乌弗瑞克欢呼！您是至高王！我们为你的荣耀举杯欢庆。

String.Source: That sounds amazing. I can't even begin to imagine the sort of rush that comes with taking on a troll. Or a group of angry bandits.
String.Dest: 太可怕了，我甚至无法想象干掉一只巨魔，或者解决一组愤怒的强盗这种乱七八糟的任务分配。

String.Source: Isn't that strange how things works out? Although I'm sure it's a lot different that Kvatch.
String.Dest: 事情了结得很奇怪对吧? 尽管我确定跟科瓦奇城有点不一样.

String.Source: I always knew you could do it. I knew if I kept waiting, that one day you'd come home.
String.Dest: 我就知道你能做得到. 我知道只要等着, 总有一天你会回家的.。

String.Source: Die, worm!
I aim to. The Orcs say that everything you craft carries a piece of your spirit.
String.Dest: 我打算是，兽人说你做的每件东西都含有你的灵魂。

String.Source: I'll show you what a real Orc can do!
String.Dest: 让你见识一下兽人的强大！

String.Source: I know, I know, just because I'm a smith doesn't mean I should hate reading. I just like listening to tales or hearing them sung.
String.Dest: 我知道，我知道，只是因为我是个铁匠不意味着我就该讨厌读书。我也就是喜欢听听童话或者听他们唱歌而已。

String.Source: They would be decorative art pieces, locked away in display cases or mounted over their beds.
String.Dest: 它们将会以艺术作品来修饰，之后锁在展览盒内或者装在他们的床上面。

String.Source: Take your best shot!
Business has been good, my love. Here is your share.
String.Dest: 生意不错，亲爱的，这是你的份。

String.Source: What are you doing?
Still here.
The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他在非自愿情况下不得不在独孤城过了一夜。

String.Source: Two Nords, could've easily been brothers. Come separately though, so they couldn't have known each other.
String.Dest: 悠悠诺德，拳拳之心，一对兄弟，彼此分离，相逢不识。

String.Source: Curse you!
Need something?
No one bests an Orc!
Happy hunting.
Really? I didn't think he was his type.
String.Dest: 真的？我可没觉得他会是他的菜。

String.Source: Why are you still here?
They're only allowed on the city docks now. Most of them sleep together in one building, and they're as poor as wretches.
String.Dest: 他们现在只能住在城市的港口，大部分人都挤在一栋建筑里，像乞丐一样贫穷。

String.Source: Oh, I've heard about you. And I'd say being the Dragonborn qualifies as being both strong and brave. But the humility doesn't hurt either.
String.Dest: 噢，我听说过你。我想说作为龙裔就应该具备力量以及勇气。但谦逊一些也不是什么坏事。

String.Source: In Solitude, I had the pleasure of learning under Beirand, and the displeasure of meeting his wife.
String.Dest: 在独孤城，我很荣幸能在贝尔兰德门下学习技艺，但我很讨厌见到他的妻子。

String.Source: My love, if this a dream, then does it matter what's real? We're together right now, and I can't think of any other place I'd rather be.
String.Dest: 亲爱的，如果这是一个梦，那么管它什么是真的呢？此时此刻，我们在一起，这就足够了，我不想去任何其他的地方。

String.Source: But I don't think my version of history is going to hurt anyone.
String.Dest: 但我不认为我的说法会导致任何人受到伤害。

String.Source: Got any ale or mead?
I'd never forge arms against the Empire. But the chance to forge a weapon to slay a legendary beast? Aye, that's a job for me.
String.Dest: 我永远不会制作武器来对付帝国的。不过拿去宰一头传说中的野兽？那是我要干的活。

String.Source: What can I do for you?
Drink for the thirsty, food for the hungry.
String.Dest: 渴了畅饮美酒，饿了大啖美食。

String.Source: How can I argue with that?
Easily blocked!
Show me.
I can take you!
Thank you.
Gah!
I'm sorry, sir, I'm on duty.
String.Dest: 很抱歉，先生。这是我的职责。

String.Source: I'll have your head!
You don't say. And by the looks of it, you managed to keep your wits about you. Impressive.
String.Dest: 你没说。表面上看你设法发现是不是有人情绪不对劲。真是令人影响深刻。

String.Source: Goodbye.
Do you need something?
You're the boss.
Although granted, it must get lonely out there too. So sometimes I'll forge a pendant, or a ring, just to remind them of home.
String.Dest: 就算是这么回事,我也要独自前往。所以有的时候我要锻造个吊坠, 或者戒指什么的, 作为一个家的留念。

String.Source: It's been a brutal winter. I can't remember the last time it was this cold, and for this long.
String.Dest: 这个冬天真要命，我不记得还有哪个冬天有这么冷，还持续了这么久。

String.Source: I'd like to work the Skyforge just once. Maybe I'll sneak on over there after the party.
String.Dest: 就算只有一次，我也想用一次天空熔炉，也许我应该在聚会之后偷偷的去一趟。

String.Source: Remember to get your rest, love. It's like quenching a blade. Experiences mean nothing if you don't take the time to reflect on them.
String.Dest: 记住要好好休息，亲爱的。它就像是给刀刃淬火。经验是指你在这件事情上学到了多少，而不是做这件事情多久。

String.Source: As you will.
Get lost.
Oh? Where should we move to?
And a hero you are. You're the dragonborn, the one these people have been waiting for.
String.Dest: 而且你是个英雄。你是龙裔，你就是那个这些人一直在等待的人。

String.Source: The blades I forge may hold my spirit, and my love, but they don't have my eyes.
String.Dest: 我所锻造的武器注入了我的灵魂，和我的爱,但是他们却没有我的眼睛。

String.Source: I'm on your side!
